Download right now the greener tree growing app among the get rich games in the store and enjoy the clicker game mechanics to have fun anywhere you are.

name: Monkey King: Master of the Clouds
summary: A huge Japanese coin-op hit developed by HOT-B in 1989, the game was later renamed Cloud Master when released outside Japan on the Sega Master System. This upgraded release of the original arcade version includes HD ready elements by developer Starfish-SD, the company formed by the original HOT-B development team. For the first time, live online leaderboards will add a worldwide competitive quality to the game not possible before.

name: Moto Roader MC
summary: Moto Roader MC is a racing game by NCS and is the third episode of the Moto Roader series. Up to five players can race each other on twenty five tracks (five courses of five tracks each) as they vie for the first place. Unlike other games of the series, each track is constructed of a single static screen and is reminiscent of the arcade classic Super Sprint. Each race is made out of eight laps where anything goes! Cars are invincible and can fire an unlimited amount of rockets and bombs which, consequently, leads the gameplay more towards speed and attack. All the racing tracks display a showcase of exquisite themes - from classic "City" and "Nature" scapes to more elaborate designs such as the fantasy "Marchen" or the unique "Special" courses. Road hazards also spice up the game and make each play session unique - from classic pits, speed boosters to shortcuts and disorienting teleporters.

name: Monster Complete World
summary:
Monster Complete World could be considered like some kind of Pokémon game for PlayStation. The player controls a young kid that have to start his journey buying a pet and after that he will explore the land in search of new pets. The battle system is like this: You order different kind of attacks to your pet and when you see that the enemy is weak enough you can try to catch it to join it to your party.

The monsters you catch will join your party and can be used in the next battles. The player can also buy different kind of goods to cure his pets or improve them.

name: MotoRodeo
summary:
You're second in the grueling competition of an all-day MotoRodeo. Your customized truck, a cherry little number, speeds through the dangerous obstacle course. You quickly break through a brick wall, rumble through a muddy ditch, and jump high into the air. You grin widely as you land on a Plymouth, crushing it beneath the weight of your monster truck. 
 
Up till now, you and your opponent, Trucker Tom, have been neck and neck throughout the competition, but you've just pulled ahead. Your truck paid its dues during the early part of the competition, but you're confident that you've got the skills needed to outmaneuver Tom as you race for the finish line. 
 
Your adrenalin pounds. You psych yourself up for the few remaining obstacles. You're only slightly ahead of Tom, but there are still a few more walls and cars to crush. Good thing you learned quickly to jump the mud which is slowing Tom down. 
 
You rev your engine, add a burst of acceleration, and jump the last mud hole as you race for the finish line. Trucker Tom has finally met his match!

name: Mooncharmer
summary: Inspired by the work of Yiannis Moralis and Moon Mysticism

name: Momotaro Dentetsu 16 Gold
summary: Momotaro Dentetsu 16 Gold is a video game in the Momotaro Dentetsu series of board game-style video games, genre released in 2006 by Hudson Soft.

name: Mortal Trap Dungeon
summary: Mortal Trap Dungeon is a precision platformer with exploration elements, featuring stages filled with a wide variety of enemies and deadly traps!

name: ModernFactory
summary: 3D fixed perspective, unique level, just press the spacebar to push the wrong robot into the ruins to get points. Note: There were only 5 chances of turnover.

name: Monster City
summary: Blupi and his monster friends embark on a brave mission to make human friends!

name: Moondusk Masquerade
summary: An otome romance game inspired by Cinderella, Bridgerton and Faeries - featuring a GxB/BxB/GxG romance!

name: Mokoko X
summary: Nostalgic arcade gameplay remastered! Capture areas and save the girls from various troublemakers.

name: Mother of All Battles!
summary:
Mother of All Battles is a turn-based strategy game where you build units to conquer the opponents' cities.

The shareware version is restricted to one human and one computer player fighting on a small map at the easiest difficulty setting.

name: M.O.O.D.S.
summary: M.O.O.D.S. is a Roguelite shooter with Robots fighting using the powers of Emotions. Blast crazy mechs with a myriad of Weapon x Addins combinations. Talk to Bosses to change their combat style. Change your Basic Skills with dozens upgrades. Play solo or with friends!

name: Mondschein
summary: Old Fynn tells of his life and remembers his past. He always wanted to go to the stars. And when the opportunity arose, he joined a space mission. But on this mission, the ship is shot down by unknown persons. However, Fynn can escape in a rescue pod - and crashes on an alien planet. There he is picked up by the girl Ki, who becomes his companion from now on. With her help, he sets out to find the so-called people of the moon, always pursued by terrible nightmares.

name: Monster Rampage VR
summary: Welcome to Monster Rampage - a VR shooter game. You must use all of your skills and resources to defend yourself against the invasion of monsters.

name: MobOS
summary: mobOS is a game that updates in real time and takes place exploring an alternate universe's operating system and its internet in the year 2005.

name: Monument Valley: Forgotten Shores
summary: Forgotten Shores is a paid content pack that adds 8 new levels to Monument Valley.

name: Momotaro Dentetsu World Deluxe
summary: Momotaro Dentetsu WORLD Deluxe is a video game in the Momotaro Dentetsu series of board game-style video games genre by Hudson Soft for mobile phones.

name: Monsterfall
summary: Unleash your inner beast! Compete against fierce monsters in Monsterfall, a thrilling multiplayer game where you'll choose from 6 unique characters, each with their own powers and abilities. Who will reign supreme?

name: Mobile Police Officer Earth Gumble
summary: ■Side-scrolling belt-scrolling exhilarating action game A very, very, very difficult berserk game in which the player tries to defeat the last boss with no recovery of energy at all!

name: Mortgage Me Daddy
summary: A single-screen satirical game where you press a button to request a mortgage… and you're always told no. There is no ending. No progress. Just despair — for the price of a coffee.

name: Moonshine Inc.
summary: Become the best moonshiner there ever was, with accurate distillation methods recreated. Fermentation and distillation are simulated using exact formulas. Remember, nothing is illegal till you get caught!

name: Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf
summary: 'Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf' is a quirky 3D roguelite-action game where you play as Bradley the Breadapus, a waffle-tailed bread platypus, battling moldy monstrosities to save the Bread Kingdom! Dodge, slap, and upgrade yourself to restore freshness and fight the rise of the mold!

name: Monsters, Inc.: Wreck Room Arcade - Bowling for Screams
summary:
This game is part of the Wreck Room Arcade series which consists of four different "activities". You can buy and play them separately, but they link into the same main menu - and, if you have bought them all, you get another bonus game for free (it will be unlocked after you've installed the last game).

"Bowling for Screams" is a fun bowling game with the characters from the Disney/Pixar movie "Monsters Inc.". It's no normal bowling - the lanes are littered with obstacles and you can maneuver the bowling ball with the arrow keys.

name: Monster Truck Attack Collection
summary: Defy gravity, earn the glory. Your one-way ticket to monster truck immortality.

name: Mortal Kombat: Armageddon - Premium Edition
summary:
Available exclusively on the PlayStation 2, the Mortal Kombat: Armageddon -- Premium Editions (there are four variations) feature a number of bonuses from the series' renown history. All of the MK: Armageddon Premium Editions feature metallic packaging, three depicting the series favorite characters (Sindel & Shao Kahn, Johnny Cage & Goro, and Kano & Sonya), and the fourth with a variation of the MK: Armageddon retail box art.
Included in the Premium Edition are an arcade–perfect version of the original Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3, a DVD video featuring a "History of Fatalities" movie along with new videos for more than 50 of the Mortal Kombat characters, and animation cell cover art autographed by franchise co–creator, Ed Boon

name: Molly n' D.O.G.'s Records
summary:
You are Molly, a dog accompanied by her D.O.G. (Digging operational guide) who is exploring a ruined world to find everything that remains under its rubbles.

Your goal is to find relics hidden behind rocks, so you must select one of 3 tool to dig and hope to find it before it's too much broken and the whole structure collapse.

After you've found them, you can check the artefact inside Molly and D.O.G.'s Records to learn more info about it.

name: Mop'n Spark
summary: "MOP'N SPARK" is a 2D puzzle platformer where a street cleaner and an electrician—an unlikely duo—team up to tackle challenging stages.

name: Moving Out: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Become a removals master with the Moving Out Deluxe Edition! In this edition you will receive:
- Moving Out
- Employees of the Month Pack
- Movers in Paradise

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate + Injustice 2 Legendary Edition Bundle
summary: The Ultimate Fighter Bundle delivers the ultimate 1-2 punch, combining both of NetherRealm Studios' blockbuster fighting franchises in one knockout package. Includes Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate and Injustice 2: Legendary Edition.

name: Montezuma's Revenge: 8-Bit Edition
summary: You play as a treasure hunter named Panama Joe, whose goal is to find an ancient treasure hidden by Aztec warrior deep inside catacombs. But beware, the catacombs are a large maze inhabited by monsters. Bouncing and rolling skulls, dancing spiders, disappearing and re-appearing chains and tons of fire await you. You'll have to find many keys and unlock doors in order to reach your goal.

name: Monster Hunter Wilds: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition includes Monster Hunter Wilds (main game) and the Monster Hunter Wilds Deluxe Pack!

name: MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga
summary: Become the deciding factor between fate and ruin. MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga is a narrative-driven RPG where choices impact character, combat and consequence. In a world of celestial magic and violence-devoted talking animals, the only reality may be to perish or persevere.

name: Mountain Bicycle Rider Simulator
summary: Are you ready to experience the thrill of cycling on snowy mountain peaks? Mountain Bicycle Rider Simulator invites you to an unforgettable adventure with realistic graphics. Now explore and pedal to the top!

name: Monster Hunter Frontier G
summary: Monster Hunter: Frontier G is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) in the Monster Hunter franchise for Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360, PlayStation Vita, PlayStation 3 and Wii U. As of August 2014, the game has 4.5 million registered players.

name: Motorhome: Traveling North America 3 - Collector's Edition
Moon Breakers
summary: Moon Breakers is a free to play, multi-player 3D space combat game set in an alternate WWII-inspired future. As either a Government or Pirate pilot, take to the stars in single-seat starfighters and engage in epic dogfights for Helium-3 around the galaxy. A modern multi-player take on the classic space combat genre of the 1990's, Moon Breakers delivers thrilling gameplay with simple controls that will have you flying and shaking bandits off your six in minutes. Coupled with a bold, retro-futuristic art style, amazing music by Bear McCreary (Battlestar Galactica, The Walking Dead) and a variety of ships to unlock and upgrade, Moon Breakers is pure space combat awesome. Sign up, climb in and get ready for launch... there are fortunes to be made.

name: Mor
summary:
Set in the Swedish archipelago in the 70s, take the role of 17-year old Linn as she returns to the island where she almost drowned as a child.

After a fight with her mother, Linn is left alone in the family's old summer home. There she finds an old spirit board, through which she finds herself communicating with Mikael, a strange entity with a secret it desperately wants to share with her.

name: Modern Combat 3: Fallen Nation
summary: When fighting for his land, a soldier knows no fear. Across 13 intense campaign missions and in frantic multiplayer skirmishes, you will fight an apocalyptic battle for the freedom of the United States in Modern Combat 3: Fallen Nation.

name: Mortal Coil: Adrenalin Intelligence
summary:
The year is 2005. "Mortal Coil" is the code name of a covert agency of crack undercover mercenaries who are funded by first-world governments. Its role: to investigate a series of sabotages and terrorist attacks on key research installations. Your prerogative as an elite team of this agency is to find the terrorists and terminate them. Naturally, things are not as clear-cut as they seem, and as you progress from one mission to the next, you will learn more about the nature of your adversaries and what their agenda really is.

A team-based first person shooter with a real-time waypointing system allowing players to give missions to his/her teammates, strategical commands like breaching rooms from different situations like doors, corners, t-junctions and open areas. The AI of the teammates allows them to react to enemy movements and other targets. With an arsenal of 11 weapons and other equipment, you have to eliminate 18 different types of enemies in 7 different and long missions.

name: Monster Rancher
summary: Monster Rancher is a console game released in 1997 for the PlayStation system. It is the first game in Tecmo's Monster Rancher series, featuring the raising, fighting, and breeding of monsters.

name: Moon Waltz
summary: One innocent dude goes out just to get some cigs. But as the clouds reveal the full moon, something way more than a joyful stroll begins!

name: Monster Galaxy
summary: Monster Galaxy is back with an exciting new chapter! The great Zodiac has become mysteriously misaligned and now it's up to you to set things right. Train with top Tamer Reina! Team up with brilliant astrologer Noor! Visit familiar lands and venture to unexplored corners of the world! Recover the twelve long-lost relics, return them to their rightful place on the Zodiac Islands, and restore balance to the Galaxy.

name: Momotaro Dentetsu 15: Godai Bonbii Toujou! no Maki
summary: Momotaro Dentetsu 15: Godai Bonbii Toujou! no Maki is a video game in the Momotaro Dentetsu series of board game-style video games, genre released in December 8, 2005 by Hudson Soft for the PlayStation 2. The game was only released in Japan.

name: MoonLight
summary: Remember the feeling of being frozen of fear under your blanket, in your childhood bed, being absolutely sure there's monster under the bed? In MoonLight you get to face your childhood fears, getting rid of shadows through an atmospheric dream world filled with puzzles and wonder.

name: Monarch Cocoon
summary: Embark on a journey through four breathtaking worlds, each reflecting a season of life — all connected through a mysterious island at the center of time.

name: Moonlight Cow: Guardian of the Night
Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX
summary: Welcome to the magical world of Monster Rancher! The beloved series makes its triumphant return with Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX, bringing together the wildly popular simulation games – Monster Rancher and Monster Rancher 2 – all in one amazing collection. Raise your own monsters and train them to compete against other eccentric creatures in combat and tournaments. With hundreds of different monster types, each with their own skills and abilities, every Rancher will be able to raise and train a monster that's a perfect fit for their personality and play style. Returning fans and newcomers alike can enjoy the timeless monster training and battling experience in Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX!

name: Mother Bunker VR
summary:
Embark on a Post-Apocalyptic Virtual Reality Adventure Like No Other!
Welcome to Mother Bunker, an open-world, post-apocalyptic zombie first-person shooter (FPS) that combines intense survival with a touch of humor. This single-player VR game, crafted for ages 16+, will challenge your decision-making, resource management, and combat skills in a beautifully designed low-poly world.

name: Monsters and Monocles
summary: Monsters and Monocles is a frantic top-down shooter for 1-4 players. Use teamwork and your arsenal of weapons to defeat the overwhelming hordes of evil. All the levels are procedurally generated with new layouts, objectives, and secrets each time you play.

name: Moonlighter
summary: A VMU game released with Time Stalkers.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Mountain's Secret
summary: This is the sequel to Mountain's Memory. Mountain's Secret is an adventure game where you must escape from mysterious ruins while evading enigmatic dolls. Uncover the secrets left unresolved in the previous story, and reveal the true nature of the mountain.

name: Morbius: The Utopia Conspiracy
summary: The City of Frankfurt/M. is struck by a series of cruel murders. At the same time, Mike Morbius, private detective, gets assigned a new task about some suspicious project called "Utopia". Can Morbius find out what's going on? Is there any link to the murders? Only Mike Morbius can find out. Currently, this game is available in German language only. Please keep in mind that this game heavily relies on text and speech. Knowledge of German language is mandatory! Loosely based on the characters and setting of the books "Meister des Feuers" and "Downtown" written by Johann C. Lotter. Permission to release this game was granted by the book author.

name: Motionrec
summary: An action puzzle game with the concept of "recording and replaying movements."

name: Monster Crown
summary:
Monster Crown - Dark Monster Catching Game with True Crossbreeds

Featuring a brand new dynamic breeding system and a deep story in a world filled to the brim with optional content. Offer contracts to dangerous beasts and breed them to create new species. Travel across Crown Island with your Monsters as you work toward stopping an underground plan to revive the sadistic Philosopher Kings and return them to their thrones

name: Modiverse
summary: Modiverse provides a sandbox environment with the ability to create and play mods such as TTT, Deathrun, FortWars, RP and more! Use the many sandbox tools to build complex worlds with props, lights, thrusters, wheels and much much more! Play the countless maps and experiences, or create your own using our extensive mod SDK and support network.

name: Monarch
summary: Play as Monarch, the masked duelist! Aid him on his quest to seek out the strongest fighters of the realm!

name: Morse Academy
summary: Three operatives return to the ruins of their abandoned boarding school, chasing a cryptic fugitive. But as they traverse through the school, old wounds resurface, and fear turns them against each other.

name: Motorcycle Boy
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Monster High Skulltimate Secrets
summary: It’s your first day at Monster High, where all monsters are welcome… but some strange events are happening. Can you uncover the mystery of the doors and ancient keys and bring the school back to its authentic, spooky self? Play and discover its skulltimate secrets. Create your unique monster character with a vault full of different monster kinds, skills, and scary-chic looks to choose from. Explore the school with your beasties Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, and Frankie Stein, and find creeperific clues and powerful new skills. As the newest member of the Boo Crew, you’re in for one hex-citing adventure!

name: Monster Manor
summary: Monster Manor is a puzzle RPG developed by Prope. Taking place in a haunted mansion, players create rooms by laying out map pieces given to them by StreetPass-encountered players. Laying pieces of the same color together expands the room, sometimes revealing treasure chests that offer new weapons and items. The main task is to uncover the stairs to the next floor in order to progress. When entering a new room, the player may encounter an enemy, which they must face against using their equipped weapon, which uses rechargeable batteries to function. During battle, the player can either fire at the enemy, which uses one battery charge, or defend against the enemy's attack, which slowly drains the battery meter. Defeating enemies earns experience points which can power up the equipped weapon. There are various types of weapon, some of which are more effective against certain enemies. If the player runs out of health points, they will faint and their session will end.

name: Mondrian: Plastic Reality
summary: Mondrian's back & he's taking his friends for a time-tripping, brickbreaking spin through the Plastic Reality. Explore hundreds of ever-changing levels, compete on Leaderboards, build a Museum, and share your own creations via Mondrian Maker and Steam Workshop. The canvas is waiting.

name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Experience Calradia as never before with the Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Deluxe Edition. The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

• Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord (full game)
• Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Digital Companion, containing:
• An interactive map of Calradia
• Travels in Calradia audio story book
• Soundtracks from the game
• Concept Art

name: MotoGP 20: Historic Pack
summary: Buy the Historic Pack and compete with four of the most iconic riders of MotoGP history and their bikes!

name: Monkey Lost
summary: Players guide a playful young monkey through lush, vibrant jungles filled with colorful animal companions. At its core, Monkey Lost tells a story of friendship, perseverance, and the search for home. With its charming characters, delightful visuals, and family-friendly design, the game offers a jungle journey that appeals to players of all ages.

name: Monster Jam Steel Titans: Fire & Ice Truck Bundle
summary: Fire & Ice includes 12 more Monster Jam trucks to compete in – some from real life and some toy designs!

name: Monster Truck Championship: Rebel Hunter Edition
summary: A true Monster Truck simulation. A unique and challenging motor racing experience where local or online victory depends solely on your driving skills. 16 customizable trucks, 25 arenas and 3 leagues to win to become champion!

name: MotoGP '08
summary:
For the first time in recent years, the game includes the addition of playable 125cc and 250cc support classes.

MotoGP '07 for the PlayStation 2 had a reputation for emphasis on simulation in contrast to the MotoGP titles published by THQ, which have a reputation for arcade gameplay. MotoGP '08 is reported to balance these different styles and allow the player to configure an emphasis towards their desired gameplay.

name: Mom Crush: Hidden Hotel Love Story
Monster Outbreak
summary: Monster Outbreak is a 2D pixel game, where you will need to survive waves of monsters coming from every direction. Enchant your weapons, build your base, and see how long you and your team can survive!!!

name: Monsty Corp: The Sequels
summary: Two Timelines crossing over. Your actions will impact the future in ways you never could have imagined!

name: Moonlight In Garland
summary: A chill open-ended life sim about finding your feet, making a positive impact and enjoying the journey in the big city. Find an apartment, make friends, grow plants and love your city life!

name: Mosaics Galore
summary:
Save the magical pets from imprisonment!
Travel through the most enchanting scenes of a
fantasy kingdom.

name: Motor Mash
summary:
Motor Mash is a top down cartoon racer for 1 to 4 players by using a multi-tap or by sharing the joypad similar to Micro Machines 2.

You can choose to play single player practice, Knockout Races, Single Player Tournaments, Multi Player Tournaments, Beat the Clock and Team Knockout. Players can select from 12 characters and race across level with different themes. There's jungle, aztec temples, inner city, wild west, nightmare, arctic themes. Each of the themes have unique hazards like bridges, crossing trains, oil wells, cyclones, snowmen and killer plants.

In each race the goal is to leave your opponents far behind so they go off screen. You can by pushing them off bridges or into hazards. When there is one player left, that player wins and all other players return to start again from that point. Each time credits are awarded depending on how long each player lasted on screen. Lose all credits and you're out of the game, last man standing wins the race.

name: Moonlighter: Between Dimensions
summary: The village of Rynoka. Once again peaceful and prosperous after the events of the Fifth Door. Shaded with green trees, inhabited by adventurous and entrepreneurial creatures alike. You can understand why a person would like to live here endlessly. However, life doesn't stop for anybody. The wind of change is blowing through Rynoka. A new, cryptic Portal appeared out of nowhere. Does it bring a new threat? Or is it a new way to make an easy profit? And most importantly... are you prepared to enter the unknown?

name: Motion Wulin
summary: "Motion Wulin" is a fast-paced martial arts action game where you play as a time-traveling warrior fixing broken timelines.

name: Monsters & Munitions
summary: Monsters & Munitions is a physics-based Collectible Card Game (CCG) that has you firing devastating shots at your enemies. Shuffle up your deck, pick your artillery, and face off against the maniacal Dr. Frank and his monster army in Monsters & Munitions. Send Dr. Frank and his monsters back into the dark ages with the help of your trusty tank, blasting a wide array of over 80 different munitions that can be boosted and leveled up for even more monster exploding fun in this explosive physics-based CCG!

name: Momotaro Densetsu Gaiden
summary:
A spin-off of Hudson's Peach Boy RPG series that focuses on three side characters instead.

Momotarou Densetsu Gaiden ("Peach Boy Legend Side-Story"), known as Momotarou Densetsu Gaiden: Dai 1-Shu ("Peach Boy Legend Side-Story: Volume 1") for PC Engine, is a non-core entry in Hudson's Momotarou Densetsu series of RPGs loosely inspired by the titular folklore figure. It was first released on the Game Boy in 1991, and then ported to the PC Engine the next year and the Famicom the year following that.

The game switches focus from Momotarou to three extra characters, each has their own distinct campaign to play through. One follows a standard RPG route of a hero's journey, another involves the princess of the kingdom of demons as she attempts to uncover an attack on her father's throne with a band of allied monsters, and the third involves a thief who steals money from monsters and gives it to beggars. Each campaign follows the core gameplay of the series: overworld exploration and turn-based combat.

name: Moonsouls: The Lost Sanctum - Collector's Edition
Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition
summary: New to Mortal Kombat 1? Get started with the Definitive Edition for the most extensive Mortal Kombat 1 Experience!

name: Monmusu Girls: Autobattler
summary: This is a strategic and adventurous idle auto-battler where you'll collect a variety of monmusu girls, form your adventuring team, and challenge the Demon King! Each girl comes with unique skills and bonds, and mastering the right combinations is the key to victory. Embark on a magical journey!

name: Mortal Kombat X: Tanya
summary: New playable character. Play as Klassic Mortal Kombat character Tanya.

name: Motu Patlu Super Duper Man
summary: Motu Patlu Super Duper Man is an endless skating game where you can collect the coins and cross the hurdles. With a Motu Patlu characters skating on a busy road where you can find the path for survival to be very challenging and demanding a quick response. Here you have to escape him while running cars, trains, and different other hurdles. This skating game has a beautiful environment across the path and ultimate game play. You can also collect coins to unlock different Skate and other items of more importance in-game.

name: Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition
summary:
Discover Monument Valley - A quest for forgiveness in a strikingly beautiful and mysterious world.

Embark on a journey of forgiveness along with Ida, the silent princess, through impossible environments and illusionary puzzles. Experience this meditative and calming puzzle game by manipulating monuments and creating evolving paths to explore new, surreal, and mysterious worlds.

Step into the new expanded world of Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition - and experience more intriguing impossibilities than ever before.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Premium Edition
summary:
Mortal Kombat 11 is the latest installment in the critically acclaimed franchise, providing a deeper and more personalized experience than ever before.

The Mortal Kombat 11 Premium Edition includes:
• Main Game
• Kombat Pack

The Kombat Pack includes:
• 6 new DLC playable characters, released over time
• 7 exclusive Character Skins
• 7 exclusive sets of gear

The physical Premium Edition had a steelbook case and came with a download code for the Kombat Pack.
This edition was removed from purchase on digital stores after the announcement of the Aftermath expansion.
A new edition, Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath Kollection, and bundle, Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath + Kombat Pack, seem to be the direct replacements.

name: Monument Valley: The Trilogy
summary:
Monument Valley: Trilogy is a puzzle game featuring geometric landscapes and optical illusion-based levels. Players navigate through surreal architectural environments, solving spatial puzzles by manipulating the game's architectural structures. The series follows a silent protagonist through interconnected puzzle worlds, combining minimalist design with intricate spatial challenges.

It includes:

• The complete series in one physical edition
• Includes Six Premium Art Cards, featuring gorgeous scenes from each game
• Exclusive, Sleek all- black O-Sleeve design
• Pre-orders receive a download code for all three Monument Valley soundtracks
• Region Free - Worldwide Compatibility

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures
summary: Moorhuhn 'Traps and Treasures' for Nintendo Switch brings 21 challenging levels + 6 bonus levels full of dangerous traps, devious enemies and hidden treasures!

name: Monkey Kick Off
summary:
Monkey has been buzzing around doing his Monkey Lander thing for a while now and has decided to drop back down to earth from his little orange spaceship in honour of the 2006 World Cup. In fact, Monkey has gone football crazy, so get those Monkey feet in tip top shape and kick your way to the Monkey Village where all your Monkey friends will be waiting to welcome the longest kicks home!

It's easy to play Monkey kick off - simply click your left mouse button or press any key on your keyboard to have Monkey kick the ball. Remember, you need to time it just right. Here's a hint from Monkey himself:

“It's all about the laws of physics. Think speed and angle for monster kicks.”

This summer, you can also challenge your friends to beat Monkey's best kick. It's easy to do! Simply click on the Challenge Monkey button and send the link to your mates. Send it via e-mail or instant message to that special competitive someone that you really, really want to beat or post the link on your blog to challenge the world! Let your Monkey friends watch your best shot via Monkey's instant replay, and then chuckle as they attempt to beat it themselves.

Let the games begin… and may the best Monkey win!

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Bonds of the Battlefield
summary: Play involves stepping into a P.O.D. (Panoramic Optical Display) and doing battle with other players across Japan.

name: Monastery Builder
summary: Become a monk in a medieval European monastery. Be diligent with your duties, and develop and expand your friary. Learn plenty of useful skills and contribute to raising the standard of living for the local community.

name: Monopoly Family Fun Pack
summary:
A new era of Monopoly for home consoles! The Monopoly Family Fun Pack gathers the 3 Monopoly Games:

- Monopoly PLU: the classic Monopoly with a 3D animated board!
- My Monopoly, to create your very own board
- Monopoly Deal, a fast-paced and addictive Monopoly card-game

Enjoy the classic Monopoly in new fun ways, with your friends and people all around the world!

name: Mosaic
summary: Mosaic is a mysterious narrative game, where you follow the repetitive and lonely life of an average commuter.... Until one day, when strange things start happening.

name: Mortal Kombat HD Arcade Kollection
summary: Before the announcement of Mortal Kombat: Arcade Kollection, different online stores started listing Mortal Kombat HD: Arcade Kollection. It was supposed to include Mortal Kombat 1, Mortal Kombat II and Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3, just like the released version. However unlike the released version, the cancelled HD-Version also had new sounds and completely new graphics with new actors portraying the characters in HD.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Kingdom Collection DLC Pack
summary:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack featuring three Elgado characters for you to use as your hunter’s appearance and voice!

This additional content includes:

- "Fiorayne" Hunter layered armor set
- "Rondine" Hunter layered armor set
- "Arlow" Hunter layered armor set
- Hunter Voice: Fiorayne
- Hunter Voice: Rondine the Trader
- Hunter Voice: Arlow

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 2
summary: The hunts are heating up in the Kingdom! Powerful new Rare and Subspecies descend upon the land, plus a twisted new form of Elder Dragon rises from the shadows in free Title Update 2.

name: Mojo
summary: "Mojo” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Several beautiful girls will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girls.

name: Mole Mania DX
summary:
This remastered version of Mole Mania, allows you to enjoy the game in full color for the first time ever in 30 years for the Game Boy Color.

Guide Muddy Mole through more than 200 screens full of puzzles to rescue his family from Jinbe the farmer.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Sindel
summary:
"The former Queen of Edenia will stop at nothing to keep her place. When threatened with the loss of her throne when Shao Kahn conquered her realm, Sindel betrayed her husband, and her people, to keep her privileged position. Now Shao Kahn's wife and Queen of Outworld, she enjoys power and wealth beyond most people's imagination. Good luck to anyone who tries to take it from her."

Mortal Kombat 11: Kombat Pack owners had a week of early access to this DLC.

name: Moloch: Zero
summary: Welcome to MOLOCH (Zero), the official interview simulation for MOLOCH Corporation. If you are reading this, you have been selected as a potential candidate for further screening for the position of [shift manager] within MOLOCH Corporation.

name: Mongol 2
summary: Call me Mongol! Some time ago, I ventured into Agrippa's perilous realm to claim the false god's life. Armed with an arsenal of weird weapons given onto me by Mithrithnogg, the prophet of worms, I uncovered a dark truth that shook the very foundation of reality!

name: Moto Rush Reborn
summary: Feel the pulse of retro-futuristic Tokyo veins urging you to go faster, drawing you deeper. Surrender to the speed, let the thrill consume your essence. Each surge, each flicker of light, is your path to glory or oblivion in 'Moto Rush Reborn'. Is your soul worth this speed?

name: Mosaics Galore 2
summary: Set course for adventure in Mosaics Galore 2 and find your fantasy! 120 magical fantasy mosaics are already waiting!

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Special Edition
summary: Amazon Exclusive Mortal Kombat 11 Special Edition includes Kold War Skarlet Skin DLC.

name: Moonrise Fall
summary: ​Moonrise Fall is an atmospheric puzzle game about a boy who finds himself lost in a supernatural forest after losing both parents in a car crash. Armed with a clue filled journal, a camera, and a lantern he must unravel the mysteries of the forest and photograph the strange creatures that reside there.

name: Module:Berserk
summary: MODULE:BERSERK is a 2D pixel "hard-boiled" action game with steampunk-inspired world of endless desertification and corruption. Play as a butler-styled automaton. Track down the suspect that caused terrifying event to the family you serve. And protect the only survivor, 'lady' from upcoming dangers.

name: Mordheim: City of the Damned - Undead
summary: This Warband adds the Undead, with 7 new unit types and a fully playable campaign featuring unique Dramatis Personae, Katherina von Dernsbach. On the borders of the Empire, beneath the World's Edge Mountains lies the forsaken province of Sylvania.

name: Mothiary
summary: Collect and raise hundreds of delicate moths in your cozy nighttime terrarium. Discover rare species, grow your collection, and unwind in a relaxing idle sanctuary.

name: Mobile Light Force
summary: Mobile Light Force is a sloppy localization of the first Gunbird for PlayStation originally released in 1994. This localization removed all plot-related elements including cutscenes and endings, took the in-game's fan art gallery and renamed some characters with names taken from XS Games employees. The game's cover art and title screen also feature a completely unrelated artwork featuring characters resembling the main trio from Charlie's Angels. This realistic artwork is the complete opposite of the anime-styled aesthetics of Gunbird, and the characters displayed don't appear anywhere in the actual game.

name: Moss as Texture as Space Folding Onto Itself
summary: peat moss, noise, space, bodies

name: Morituria
summary: Explore an ancient underground city in this 80s-inspired dungeon crawler.

name: Monarchy
summary: A 2D strategy game about a young heir who must defend the crown from those who want to take it.

name: Monopoly
summary: The classic turn-based real estate board game brought to the PC, with all the standard features, and new features such as custom house rules, animated tokens, and local multiplayer.

name: Monster Hunter Explore
summary:
Monster Hunter Explore, formerly Monster Hunter Smart, is a version of Monster Hunter on Android and iOS.

Join the hunt! The first true Monster Hunter game for mobile has arrived. Track and hunt fierce monsters and explore an island of infinite treasures. Become a hunter of legend on your own or form a hunting party with friends.

Travel across the seas and explore new hunting grounds of legend.
Hunt powerful monsters, discover epic treasures and unlock the secrets of a new land.
Create a hunting party of up to 4 friends or play with hunters over the internet.
Master 14 types of weapons – Powerful “Great Swords” dynamic “Hammers” and the lethal “Gunlance”.
Master the art of the hunt by using monsters’ weaknesses against them. More than 100 weaknesses can be targeted to help improve a hunters odds of success.

name: Moonlight Chess
summary: Moonlight Chess is a turn-based tactical auto-battler where you must assemble your own army, defeat waves of enemies, and vanquish the evil ravaging the kingdom!

name: Mourningwood Lodge
summary:
Mourningwood Lodge is a full-motion video (FMV) live-action mystery horror game. As the first installment in the Funeral Houseseries, players will assume different roles across various game modes to participate in a suspenseful horror journey blending conspiracy and fantasy.

In the initially released ​​Story Mode​​, players take on the role of an heir to the ancient sect ​​"Fangxian Dao"​​ tasked with thwarting an evil ritual. After becoming entangled in a series of premeditated events, they are implicated in a murder and must collaborate with others to escape. Throughout the process, ​​player choices will determine radically different game endings​​.

The story takes place in an eerie villa deep within the mountains. When was it built? By whom? And for what purpose? No one knows. What is certain is that this villa is far more than it appears, for those who know of its existence have all...

name: Mortal Kombat X: XL Pack
summary: XL Pack grants access to both Kombat Pack 1 and 2, as well as nearly all previously released digital content. XL Pack includes 9 playable characters, 25 character skins, and 2 previously released Klassic Fatality packs.

name: Monsterpatch
summary: A Cozy Monster-Collecting RPG, A love letter to retro monster collecting games that blends unique farming and town building mechanics!

name: Moros Protocol
summary: Your mission is not just to survive, but to face yourself, your past and prepare for "a world full of darkness and monsters". A stylized pixel painted FPS roguelike game, that combines the feel of early action-adventure games, with innovative mechanics.

name: Monobot
summary:
Monobot is a 2D physics-based puzzle platformer where you take control of Mono, a small entity caught up in a hostile world set in a dark, distant future. Coming online, Mono finds himself alone and without answers. Players must guide Mono through his solo journey, unravelling puzzles to uncover the buried secrets of this dystopian world. Can you break the infinite cycle and find your true self?

Starting as a simple robot without much knowledge of the world around him, Mono begins his journey armed only with his ingenuity and reflexes. As he traverses through the desolate world, players will slowly be able to upgrade Mono with unique enhancements to help him on his journey - a magnetic arm and teleportation arm which provide Mono with new creative solutions to the puzzles that befall him. Collect various documents and overcome numerous obstacles in order to discover humanity’s final fate.

name: Mortal Kombat: Unchained
summary: Mortal Kombat: Unchained is the portable equivalent of the console game Mortal Kombat: Deception. It contains all the characters from the GameCube version, along with four exclusive to the PSP version: Blaze, Frost, Jax and Kitana. All characters have a vast arsenal of moves, with weapons, and fatalities. The arenas are multi-tiered, interactive and contain death traps. Next to the regular battles, you can play a free-roaming adventure in the Konquest Mode, battle an endless wave of opponents in the Endurance Mode (exclusive for the PSP), go head-to-head over Wi-Fi against another human player, or try a mini-game such as Chess Kombat (chess with the MK characters) and Puzzle Kombat (Tetris with a twist).

name: Mossfield Origins
summary: A small cozy city builder style game where all buildings are built from the same foundation! Take your time, build a self sustaining community for your residents in this relaxing builder, with no time pressure or external forces. Upgrade foundations via tech tree to redefine and refactor your space.

name: Momo's Revitalization Project!
summary: A visual novel featuring VTuber Momo Mitsuki in the leading role! Work alongside your Senior, Momo Mitsuki, to bring life back to a little town!

name: Monster Ops 5
summary: NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim! Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

name: Monsters in Cards
summary: Plan each move and build your army in this monster card game.

name: Moshi Monsters
summary: Moshi Monsters is a browser-based social game for children, combining elements of an RPG, a virtual pet, an adventure game and Facebook. It allows players to sign up and adopt a monster for free, offering extra content for subscribers.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Frost
summary:
"You can earn Frost in-game for free as a playable character by completing Chapter 4 of the Story Mode. You can also purchase Frost immediately.

Grandmaster Sub-Zero's most dangerous apprentice. When Sub-Zero made historic peace with his clan's enemy, Scorpion, defiant Frost challenged her Grandmaster as unfit to lead. Sub-Zero defeated and banished Frost. For years, she sought the power to destroy him. Now she has it."

name: Moorestech
summary: Factory automation meets anime-style RPG. Harness gears and shafts to power machines and conveyors, building an automated factory. Produce items and research tech, evolving from windmills to fusion as you trace humanity’s tech evolution, then launch a rocket home to uncover the truth of your exile.

name: Moo & Move: Extra Grazing Grounds
summary: Guide the hungry cow to its goal. Place directional tiles on the ground and to solve the puzzles. Watch as the cow follows the path to reach its tasty hay.

name: Mordeny
summary: Prepare for fast-paced, strategic combat in Mordeny, a thrilling 2D top-down shooter where quick reflexes and tactical thinking are your best weapons. Explore unique gamemodes and customize your own character as you unlock new abilities and gear. Whether you're battling solo or teaming up with friends, Mordeny offers an action-packed adventure like no other where every battle demands precision and skill. Join the fight and experience the thrill today!

name: Mouseburg: Pursuit of Power
summary: Mouseburg is a turn-based resource management game where you compete to become the most influential tycoon. Buy real estate, acquire company stock, invest in city projects, and gain influence to become the most powerful mouse in the city!

name: Mother: Encore
summary: A re-imagining of Mother with all new content, tweaks and remastered visuals. The soundtrack features remakes from the original game along with brand new pieces! The battle system is also built from the ground up to give each battle a more polished experience. The story adds more depth to the characters you love. The maps have no dead-ends or pesky mazes, and the world is filled with countless little touches to really bring Eagleland to life.

name: Monique: Passion Hôtesse de Caisse
summary:
Humorous and deliberately bad simulation of the daily life of a cashier.
Scan them all! Monique: Passion Hôtesse de Caisse is a unique simulation that puts you, shower in hand, in various situations where speed and dexterity are essential to satisfy the customer and your boss!

name: Morkredd
summary:
The Orb is your fate.

Morkredd is a tense, physics-based co-op puzzle game for one to two players combining skill-based puzzle-solving, a challenging balance of light and shadow, and a dark world full of secrets to unlock.

The Orb Calls for Two: Morkredd is best played as a couch co-op experience. Heed the Orb’s call with a friend or prove your loyalty alone by mastering the unique dual-character controls.
Your Path is the Orb: You are the Orb’s protector, and the Orb’s light is yours. Survive and master over 60 puzzles while avoiding the shadows caused by your partner and the environment.
The Orb is Your Only Friend: An endless abyss of deadly shadows conceal dangers in this cold, dark world. Stay with the Orb if you want to stay alive.
Gaze into the Orb: Discover ancient secrets about the Orb hidden in the darkness.

name: MoW: Face Off XL
summary: The Battlefield Card Game with a roguish community. Come join us and immerse yourself in an alt history Steampunk universe where the impossible is possible. Choose the faction that complements your play style, build a devious deck & battle your opponent across the deadly battlefield.

name: Moonday
summary:
One night a UFO crashes somewhere in rural fields. Ushitsuki, local farmer (and a cow girl) finds the alien who now needs to repair his space ship using colors hidden in Ushitsuki's dreams.

Moonday is heavily inspired by Yume Nikki and shares some mechanics with it - exploration of dream worlds via going to bed, finding/equipping special "effects" which change character's appearance/abilities, etc.

name: Mowin' & Throwin'
summary: Mowin' & Throwin' is a 2 vs 2 local multiplayer game featuring lawn-obsessed gnomes who drive riding mowers! Each match is a constant tug-of-war as you work with your teammate to mow your lawn and sabotage the other team. The team who has the least amount of grass on their lawn when time ends, wins! REQUIRES 4 XBOX CONTROLLERS!

name: MotoTrials
summary: A dark, 2.5D, 100% physics-based motorcycle platformer where you wake up locked in a shipping container and must ride through deadly obstacle courses to escape. Inspired by Squid Game, Limbo, and Trials, MotoTrials seamlessly blends storytelling and challenging gameplay.

name: Monopoly
summary: Monopoly is a video game based on the board game Monopoly, released on Genesis, NES, and SNES. Developed by Sculptured Software and published by Parker Brothers. This title was one of many inspired by the property.

name: Monmusu Paradise: Visitors
summary: Welcome to Monmusu Paradise Island, Where your lewdest memories come true! Start your adventure by exploring the island and getting items and money needed for you to get laid successfully with various girls on the island.

name: Mosaic Hearts
summary:
EVERY enemy is a (potential) new best friend!
Fight each boss, gain them as an ally, explore, and platform your way through each level. Build a strong group that can take down the final boss, Noel Weisburg.

name: Monza Legends: Classic Grand Prix 1950
summary: Relive the roar of history. Race like it's 1950

name: Movie Actor Trivia
summary: How well do you know your Movie Stars? Choose from the most popular Stars in Hollywood, including Bill Murray, Brad Pitt, Denzel Washington, Julia Roberts, Sandra Bullock, Steve Martin, Tom Cruise, Tom Hanks and Will Smith. Challenge your friends and family in Party Mode.

name: Money Print Factory 3D Tycoon
summary: Greetings, our money hungry player. This is a 3D Clicker Tycoon game where your money making adventure begins. Print money, buy & upgrade machines, and expand your factory. Gain more money, and more money, AND MORE MONEY $$$!

name: Mortal Kombat Advance
summary: Classic Mortal Kombat action returns as you defend the Earth against the most lethal fighters from Outworld. Immerse yourself in battle and prepare for the fight of your life as you enter the world of Mortal Kombat Advance and discover what awaits you.

name: Mountain King
summary: Deep inside a long-lost diamond mine is the secret Temple Chamber of a forgotten civilization. There, a priceless Golden Crown sits high on a pedestal, vulnerable to plundering explorers seeking to control its power. but this treasure is jealously guarded by the denizens of the mountain, and whoever has the daring and courage to challenge them, seize the Crown, and escape to the mountaintop with it will become MOUNTAIN KING!

name: Molecats
summary:
Аn indirect-control tile-twisting puzzled adventure ...with traps! 
 
Molecats is a challenging indirect-control puzzle game that takes place in the weird and beautiful world of... Molecats! 
 
Molecats are sort of cat-mole hybrids. They are simpletons who like mushrooms, marching and go on adventures! They usually dig into nearby caves to gather delicious ‘shrooms and shiny relics, but mostly get lost along the way. 
 
Your goal here is to guide Molecats through the caves by taking control of the environment and changing the course they follow. Along the way Molecats will face lots of dangerous traps, spooky monsters and tricky challenges and meet a whole bunch of strange but interesting creatures.

name: Moto Roader
summary: Moto Roader is a futuristic racing game that allows up to five players to compete against each other. Players use the cash earned when they win a race to power up their machine. Not only can they change the "tire" and "body" of their vehicles, but they also can add "special" parts. Jump over tall obstacles with a "hopper" and blast past rivals at incredible speeds with "nitro." What multiplayer game would be complete without attack items? Use a forward-launching "grenade" or a backward-dropping "bomber" to blow up and knock away rivals. Outmaneuver rivals in all eight heats to become the champion.

name: Monopoly Deal
summary: A card based version of Monopoly.

name: Monster Prom: XXL
summary:
Be Your Worst Self
There’s only 3 weeks left until prom and you haven’t got a date yet..and you’re a monster. But that’s okay ‘cause at your high-school everyone else is too! These are the stepping stones into the world of Monster Prom: XXL - the bundled up, content filled edition of Monster Prom, a one-to-four player competitive dating sim that will have you thinking: I never knew I was into that!

name: Mojo 2
summary: "Mojo 2” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Several beautiful girls will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girls.

name: Moonlit
summary:
Moonlit is a living testament that simplicity is never out of style, reminiscing the good old days. In the game, you play as a mysterious girl that must deal with fearful curse, triggered by the full moon.
While keeping an old school indie format, you will be able to play through a variety of scenarios, from deserts to haunted ghost-like environment, trying to find out and fight the source of the curse.

name: Moonbase IO
summary: Space shooter

name: Monopoly Here & Now
summary: Monopoly Here & Now is an updated edition of the popular classic, featuring the same reliable gameplay and board, with updated locations, utilities and situations.

name: Mortal Kombat: Tiger Barcodzz - Sonya Blade
summary: This cards were swiped into the Barcodzz handheld to add secret techniques, stats, or other variations to the gameplay.

name: Monster Max
summary: Monster Max is an isometric adventure video game developed by Rare and published by Titus Software for the Game Boy handheld game console. It was released in December 1994 in Europe and January 1995 in the United States. Monster Max was designed by Jon Ritman and Bernie Drummond and is very similar in both graphics and gameplay to Ritman and Drummond's 1987 title Head over Heels. The game sold poorly but received very positive reviews from critics.

name: MopGarden's Veggie Cart
summary:
MopGarden’s Veggie Cart is a fast-paced, simulation game where you feed hungry bunnies lots of healthy vegetables! Can you feed them all in time?

MopGarden, a variety Twitch streamer, has decided to feed all the local bunnies in her town. As business begins to boom, she moves her veggie cart to other surrounding areas, where the vegetable orders get faster, and faster, and faster.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Peacemaker
summary:
Christopher Smith, the Peacemaker, cherishes peace with all his heart. So much so, that he will kill anyone and everyone necessary to get it.

This pack includes playable character Peacemaker, based on DC's Suicide Squad, including all new movesets.

Peacemaker is a guest character based on John Cena's appearance as the character in The Suicide Squad movie and the Peacemaker television series.

name: Moujuutsukai to Ouji-sama Portable
summary: A port for PSP.

name: Mortal Kombat
summary: Game Boy port of Mortal Kombat.

name: Moonbreaker
summary: Moonbreaker is a turn-based strategy, tabletop tactics game. Designed to be a true digital miniatures experience, set in an expansive sci-fi universe crafted by Brandon Sanderson. Direct Captain & Crew to determine the fate of the Reaches in gripping, ever changing competition & adventure.

name: Monster Pub: Chapter 3
summary: Monster Pub is an episodic narrative game about finding new friends in a new town, but, uh, also everyone is a monster, including you! Be a good friend, or a bad friend! Play cards and crush your opponent! Or maybe just try to have a nice time, I'm not your boss.

name: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip - Playable Character Jacqueline
summary:
Ever feel like leaving your small town and seeing what’s out there? Then Jacqueline might be the Playable Character for you… as long as you don’t mind getting your hands dirty!

Jacqueline’s folksy farmer vibes will let you enjoy nature to its fullest as you go on a wild ride with Polly and Scott.

Play as Jacqueline in her journey far beyond the reaches of her small farm. This pumpkin is no bumpkin, and she’s ready to see the world!

Throw out your old Jack-o’-lantern and get ready to put petal to the metal with Jacqueline!

name: Modern War
summary: Modern War is a mobile strategy MMO game originally developed by Funzio, Inc. In the game, players build military bases, train armies, and engage in real-time battles against other players around the world. With customizable units and factions, players compete for territory, complete missions, and form alliances in a persistent online war setting.

name: Morbid Mailroom
summary: In a claymation prison for occult offenders, you are the package inspector. Search packages for hidden contraband, coded letters, and cursed objects. Balance duty, compassion, and survival as you decide what reaches the inmates and what burns in the incinerator. Your choices cannot be undone.

name: Monster City: A Monster College Story
summary: Set in the same universe as Monster College, this spin-off features a young vampire struggling with family problems, curses and atypical powers. Join him as he attends college and meets sexy new girls, each with their own peculiarities.

name: Monstabox
summary: Monstabox: A turn-based 1v1 battle game mixing strategy & action. Choose monsters, cast spells, roll to attack, and unleash ultimates. Win by securing the Star after KOing your opponent. Play cross-platform & compete worldwide!

name: Momotype
summary:
The monotype, an off-shoot virtual pet, is being play-tested by members of your company. You have been selected.

An experimental, retro take on tamogotchi-lite games. Will you fulfill Momo's needs or does he need something greater?

name: Move 78
summary: Eight strangers awake in an unfamiliar complex. They find themselves forced to solve intricate puzzle rooms and fight for their lives in deadly games. What happened to the outside world and why do they all remember the face of a serial murderer called the Botfly Killer?

name: Mortol
summary:
How many people will lay down their lives to save Mortolia? The first game in the Mortol series.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Moon Fall
summary: The earth's satellite, the moon, will gradually approach the earth one day in the future. Before the end came, mankind desperately launched a war to destroy civilization. On the ruins of the city, in the ruins of the church. I started my apocalyptic journey with the silver-haired girl Xun. Stumbling, full of moving and surprising.

name: Mortal Kombat X: Klassic Pack 2
summary: Contains three new character skins, Klassic Quan Chi, Klassic Jax and Klassic Kung.

name: Molar Mayhem
summary: Sink your teeth into this bite-sized arcade game. Avoid being caught by crushing jaws as you rack up a new high score.

name: Money Parasite: Usotsuki na Onna
summary: An otome game by Takuyo.

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures 3
summary: In Moorhuhn Jump and Run ‘Traps and Treasures 3’, 31 levels full of traps and enemies await you!

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Klassic Arcade Ninja Skin Pack 1
Movie Studio Boss: The Sequel
summary: You have just been appointed the head of a new Movie Studio and have been given 10 (now 50) years to make it the most successful studio around. You are up against seven other computer controlled Studios all trying to be the best Studio in the world!

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Mileena
summary:
DLC fighter added in Kombat Pack 2, released separately at a later date.

"Mileena is the perfect blend of Baraka's ferocity & Kitana's grace. Brought forward in time, this clone now knows of her reign as Empress and death at Kotal Kahn's hands. She is set on retaking her throne."

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Klassic Arcade Fighter Pack
Moonfall Voyage
summary: In Moonfall Voyage, sailing is at the heart of exploration. Your goal is to free colossal guardians from a powerful curse. Each guardian you encounter offers unique sailing challenges and puzzles as you uncover the history of this world, and restore balance to the fragile realm.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Rambo
summary:
DLC fighter added in Kombat Pack 2, released separately at a later date.

"A former Special Forces soldier haunted by his time in Vietnam, Rambo is rough, aggressive & famous for taking on perilous missions alone. Now, he brings his brutal skills in Mortal Kombat."

name: Monster Mop Up
summary: Rescue the scared little Ragamuffins from the human world- and clean up all evidence of their existence. Mop stains, burn poop, and get rewarded with high tech gear and upgrades. Save enough, and you can even expand your home, decorate it, and live happily ever after with your fluffy little friends!

name: Modern and Retro Bundle
summary: In this Bundle, you'll find modern and retro games from our studio for Xbox and Windows, including Dark Elven Legacy, where Elynar embarks on a sacred quest for ancient relics; Ducky Dash, a nostalgic tribute to retro portable games; Sunbeam Feast, a challenging precision platformer; and Mr. T-Shirt, a whimsical adventure in a paper world.

name: Mold 2: Origin
summary:
"Mold 2: Origin

" takes place before the first game in the series... explaining the origin of the mold curse. Stan lives in an isolated location with his wife Mary. He has metal detection as a hobby. After finding a strange amulet things start to get really weird.

Is it possible to break this curse? what is the origin of all this?...

name: Moebious: Endless Dream
summary: You wake up in a strange room. You must find a way out. Solve puzzles, uncover clues, and escape. The truth awaits you. In the end, where will your final choice lead you?

name: Monster Town Defense
summary: Monster town is a resource management RTS game, where you build a town of monsters, developed technology through researches, build defenses equipment and monster troops to attack the opponent town to reclaim the glory of the monster.

name: Monster Castle
summary: Simulating castle, Set up a monster army, Defend the evil empire

name: Mouse Shooter
summary: Retro shooter with simple controls Intuitive mouse controls

name: Mobility!
summary: Mobility! is an acrobatic precision platformer. Platform throughout various levels, while you fall on, slide off, or otherwise touch every block on the level. Every level is part of a larger spaceship, which has broken down in one way or another. It's up to you to get them back up running as part of your training for the Mobility, an elite-class league of master repairmen. In an age of starships and public space travel, they're often the saviors when major problems occur. Mobility is designed to appeal to a large range of players: it's not as punishing as your usual precision platformer.

name: Moonlight Destiny
summary:
A Chinese developed role-playing game that was later localized into Japanese by Nihon Falcom under the name Moonlight Destiny.

Yue Ying Chuan Shuo Jian Xia Qing Yuan Wai Zhuan is a role-playing game. Many years ago, two of the most famous people in Wulin were Yang Xilie and Shangguan Feilong. Yang Xilie, as his name implies, has a fierce personality, and often competes with Shangguan Feilong. But Shangguan Feilong is indifferent to fame and fortune and dislikes fighting with others, so he ignores his provocations, which makes Yang Xilie more and more angry. After a thrilling life-and-death struggle, Shangguan Feilong was defeated by Yang Xilie at last. But eventually the two men and up that. Ten years after those events Yang Yingfeng (Yang Xilie's son) is already a young man. He still remembers the scene ten years ago. Yang Yingfeng feels that he should go out for an adventure.

name: Monster&Strategy
summary: A dungeon adventure card game, a maze generated by the program, unpredictable monster combinations, and a large number of cards, treasures, to measure the trade-offs and build your unique card set!

name: Monster Monpiece
summary: Collect and train over 100 "monster girls" that come to life in strategic, card-based battles! Strengthen your cards with the First Crush ❤ Rub mode, taking on a hands-on role to warm them up and gain more artwork!

name: Monuments of Mars 2
summary: Monuments of Mars 2 is an eleven-level episode WAD for Doom II designed for limit removing source ports created by various members of the Doomer Boards community, led by Jon Vail (40oz). It is the forty-sixth entry in the ongoing Doomer Boards Projects. The project is an add-on sequel to the first DBP in celebration of the series' fourth anniversary. It is intended to be loaded with and continue from its predecessor and starts at MAP08.

name: Mona
summary: Mona is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. Explore Mona's subconscious, her past experience and how it is affecting her mental state.

name: Momo Pop
summary: Momo is a bubbly witch who's travelling all around space to visit her emo girlfriend, Kiki. However, her task won't be so simple: Kiki's galaxy is all full of hazards that Momo must avoid.

name: Monster Merchant
summary: You are a monster merchant. Catch cute monsters, sell them, take pills. This is your job, if you don't do it, someone else will, and you don't want that. This is a psychological horror game about catching cute creatures.

name: Monochrome World
summary:
The world lost its color all of a sudden. And only the gray remained. Nobody knows how much time has passed since then. I just kept falling from the sky to the ground over and over. I am a raindrop. Then one day, I fell to the place I've never been before. The power unknown led me to the color I thought was lost. I had no idea what it meant...

◆The adventure of a raindrop 『Monochrome World』 features the journey of a raindrop to recolor the gray world. Bring back the colors to the world in a total of 60 stages!
◆Thrilling action puzzle experience with extreme difficulty Recolor the stages full of gimmicks and puzzles! Some parts will test your speed and control!
◆Make your own cute little raindrop Clear the stage and unlock colors, shapes, accessories, and skills. Customize your own little raindrop!

name: Monster Prom 4: Monster Con XXL
summary: GET READY FOR THE MONSTER CON!

name: ?? Movie Theater
summary: This is a funny movie theater where you can watch any kind of movie. I saw a movie here. It is a story of a high school boy “Sota Sakurai” until ※※※※※※.

name: Moose Diver
summary: You’re a moose on a diving adventure. Swim into the ocean and vacuum coins from the seabed. Sell the coins and earn money to upgrade and buy new gear. Swim deeper and find treasure chests to collect power boosting artefacts, but don’t forget to keep an eye on your oxygen level.

name: Montas
summary:
You wake up at the desk of Joseph Walker, an accountant working for a firm in the city of Montas.

Normal life for Joseph has become a distant memory, haunted by nightmares of events that didn't happen, and cursed with unsettling hallucinations wherever he goes. As a result of stress and anxiety, Joseph is now an alcoholic.

Paranoia is growing, and the situation worsens when police begin to question locals about recent murders in the area. What is happening to Joseph?... and what is Montas hiding?

name: Modbox
summary: Modbox is a VR multiplayer sandbox game - create your own game experiences to play and share with others

name: Monster Slayer Extermination
summary: Exterminate once and for all the zombies and creatures that are loose in the city. Survive the chaos caused by mutants, monsters, and hideous creatures as you make your way to your escape route, but be warned, you're not going to be let off the hook.

name: Moero!! Jaleco Collection
summary: Moero!! Jaleco Collection is a Miscellaneous game, published by Jaleco Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Mo The Moai
summary: Get ready for an impossible quest! You and Mo, your Moai pal, must reach the Moai World’s summit. Keep running, jumping, and climbing—but beware! One mistake can sends you plummeting into the darkest depths of despair. Reach the top before the seventh day or the world resets. Learn, Adapt and Rise.

name: Monsta Tapwar
summary:
Face off against your friends or foes in Monsta Infinite’s MMORPG turn-based card game and beat your friends and become the #1 in our Monsta Universe.
Introducing Tapwar! The genesis of Monsta Infinite’s many contributions to the future of technology — incorporating state-of-the-art Blockchain technology into modern-day gaming!
In this strategy point-based card game, your points define your success. Join in today and collect points to climb up our ranks in our leaderboard for prizes and rewards!

name: Morbid Metal
summary: Morbid Metal is a Hack 'n' Slash, Action Rogue-lite, where you can shapeshift into unique characters to slaughter enemies with powerful combos. Switch characters in real-time to unleash your power and fight your way through hordes of deadly machines and intense bosses.

name: Mondealy: Day One
summary: Mondealy is about you building relationships and exploring the world. An ordinary guy from an ordinary town on an ordinary day uncovers the secrets of an extraordinary underground kingdom located under his home. Your adventure begins!

name: Monuments to Ruin
summary: Build defences, explore an all-encompassing fog and pray you can fight off the massive hordes of Ruin. Engage with an expansive unlock system and survive in a world that changes with your decisions. ‘Monuments to Ruin’ is a roguelite, tower defense game set in a world ravaged by a suffocating fog.

name: Monkey Fright
summary:
National Institutes of Health (NIH) experimenter Elisabeth Murray has spent the last 30 years cutting open monkeys’ skulls, suctioning out or burning portions of their brains to cause permanent damage, and locking them in cages, where she shows them large rubber snakes and spiders, terrifying them. These horrific experiments haven’t advanced human health at all, of course—they’ve only tormented and killed animals and wasted precious medical resources.

This cruelty is why 16-year-old Archit Kumar of Dublin, California, is on a mission to end speciesism, and he’s developed a video game called Monkey Fright to help accomplish that. The game brings awareness to the constant suffering and deprivation that these monkeys experience inside small, barren cages in windowless laboratories—day in and day out—where they’re denied companionship, sunshine, fresh air, exercise, and everything else they care about.

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Big Air Edition
summary: Feel the adrenaline rush with Monster Jam Showdown - Big Air Edition! Pre-order now and, in addition to the full game, you'll get: Season Pass, the two DLCs Law & Disorder and The Odd Couple and 3 days of early access!

name: Moonlighter
summary: Moonlighter is an Action RPG with rogue-lite elements that demonstrates two sides of the coin – revealing everyday routines of Will, an adventurous shopkeeper that secretly dreams of becoming a hero.

name: Morra 3D
summary: MORRA 3D is a classic boomer shooter about battling restless creatures with high-caliber guns and an ever changing storm inside of you.

name: Monster in the Dark
summary: Monster In The Dark is a single player first-person game, you will plunge into a world of fear and hopelessness when there is no way out and nowhere to run. The player must find a way out of the dense forest when chased by a monster. The player's task: to run and not stop, exploring this world.

name: Moorhuhn Fun Kart 2008
summary: Moorhuhn: Fun Kart 2008 is a kart racing game starring Moorhuhn (Crazy Chicken) and friends. The eight racing tracks range from a barnyard to beaches to a desert with pyramids in the back ground. Power-ups can be picked up and used on opponents while racing. The player can choose between seven different characters, including two chickens, a frog, turtle, snowman, scarecrow and mole. The game offers three modes: a Championship (two championship each with four tracks), time challenge and two player mode. Kart classes included are 50cc, 100cc and 150 cc.

name: Momotaro Dentetsu 11: Black Bonbii Shutsugen! no Maki
Moe Moe Daiundoukai
summary: Moe Moe Daiundoukai is a survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. the rivals are here, and there's no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.

name: Mothmen 1966
summary: Mothmen 1966 is a 'Pixel Pulp' - a visual novel featuring a fusion of exceptional writing and stunning illustration, inspired by mid-20th century pulp fiction and 80s home computer graphics - set amongst the strange occurrences of the Leonid meteor shower of 1966.

name: Moleshine Cooking Simulator
summary: Moonshine? BORING! You will cook MOLESHINE! Grow ingredients in your garden, make moonshine and upgrade it with the main ingredient - a pesky mole that wants to eat your crop!

name: More Popcorn!
summary:
More Popcorn gives you everything you need to pop, flavor, season and share all kinds of tasty virtual popcorn treats on your iPhone or iPad. Choose a popper from a pan or domed popper to a microwave or hot air popper. Tilt to pour in the oil & kernels, shake the pan or open/close the microwave door, and watch the popcorn pop!

After you’ve made a big bowl of hot popcorn, you can add 50+ coatings, toppings, and mix-ins. Caramel corn, kettle corn, cheese corn, wasabi, peppermint, fruit candy coatings, it’s all there! Then mix in chocolate chips, nuts, gummy bears, or other kinds of fun foods.

Once you’ve seasoned your popcorn just right (even shaking the phone to mix up the kernels to coat better), you can eat it or share it via email or save to your photos.

But that’s not all! You can also roll your popcorn into yummy popcorn balls, or make popcorn strings that you can use to decorate Christmas trees or wreaths, or even pick you own photo and give it the popcorn decorative touch.

name: Mollycoddle Mayhem
summary: Mollycoddle Mayhem is a couch co-op game for up to four players where you work together to spoil and pamper babies that have been anonymously abandoned. Cook, clean, change diapers, and perform various other tasks before the little ones get too upset.

name: Morphe
summary: Morphê is an ambient, music-making game set on peaceful, beautiful mountaintops.

name: Moon Rising
summary:
Have you ever wanted to fly the Moon with just one finger?
No? Well… too late. The Moon is already flying—and you’re the pilot!

Welcome to the most unnecessary yet oddly satisfying space adventure of your life.
Tap to guide the Moon as it awkwardly avoids rockets that are just... floating around for no reason. Seriously, who’s launching these things?

This isn’t your typical shoot-‘em-up space game.
There are no lasers. No explosions. No evil aliens. Just pure, awkward dodging action. One tap at a time.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: EX Revue
summary:
Mobile Suit Gundam: EX Revue is an updated version of the first Gundam fighting game. Like its predecessor, it is a Street Fighter II-style versus fighter based on the original 1979 television series of the Gundam franchise, with improved graphics, a changed and larger character roster, new arenas and a more complex fighting engine.

Players can select from 12 mobile suits: returning from the first game are the Federation's Gundam and Zeon's Zaku, Gouf, Dom and Gelgoog, the amphibious Z'Gok, as well as Char Aznable variations of Zaku, Gelgoog and Z'Gok. Sayla Mass' alternate Gundam is replaced by the Guncannon, and the game also adds Zeon's Gyan and Acguy. Each suit again features its own arena, based on locations and situations from the TV series. Many are all-new, others are just touched up from the first game. Each character also has its own ending sequence.

Single-player mode consists of 14 consecutive fights:12 against the standard suits (including a mirror match) plus 2 against secret boss enemies. The last boss suit and its pilot are not based on the TV series but were especially designed for the game. It is possible to unlock the two bosses for player selection. Two-player mode allows match-ups in all combinations: both players can select the same character.

The actual fights follow the standard best-of-three model, with the backgrounds changing slightly in each round. Controls involve the joystick and four buttons: three for light, medium and heavy attacks and one for throws (throws can also be triggered by the attack buttons). Every suit has three to four special moves (usually involving ranged weapons) triggered by input combinations, most of them requiring "Hadouken"-style circling movements with the joystick, then pressing an attack button.

name: Mortal Kombat Mobile
summary: Get over here and immerse yourself in the iconic and visceral action of MORTAL KOMBAT MOBILE anytime, anywhere. Kollect legendary fighters like Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Raiden, and Kitana and fight in epic 3v3 battles set in the Mortal Kombat universe. This visually stunning fighting and card collection game has multiple modes and re-introduces characters and lore from Mortal Kombat’s 30-Year fighting game legacy. Launch into the action today and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament in all of the realms!

name: Mortal Kombat: Komplete Edition
summary:
This Komplete Edition is a re-release of the original game. It includes the full game, alongside all previously released downloadable content. It also includes the Mortal Kombat: Songs Inspired by the Warriors album (including a bonus track) and the 1995 Mortal Kombat movie for download, via the PlayStation Store or Xbox Live Zune.

For the PS Vita and Windows this is the first release of the game. It has the same content as well as new costumes and a new Challenge Tower (Vita version only) not featured in the versions for other platforms.

name: Monster Trucking
summary: Monster Trucking is an Arcade style game requiring speed, precision and a little bit of chaos to deliver cargo as quickly as possible. Enjoy the competition of racing around the city trying to rack up the highest score through delivered goods, destruction, and stunts along the way.

name: Mother 3.5
summary: A rom hack for Mother 3 that restores unused characters, events, and features.

name: Moon Maiden: Terror on Planet X
summary: An RPG celebrating retro sci-fi and old school point and click games with a unique combat system.

name: Mow Meow
summary: A multiplayer catnip mowing simulator.

name: Moero Downhill Night 2
summary: A generation has passed since the glory days of racing in Downhill Night, and the once heart-pounding races have faded into nostalgic legend.
