Motorsport Manager Racing, the acclaimed race team strategy game is now multiplayer.
Create your very own motorsport team by hiring drivers and designing car parts, then compete against real managers from around the world in simultaneous 10 person multiplayer races.
Can you make it to the World Motorsport Championship, where the top players compete every week to be the best Motorsport Manager in the world?
Some of the world’s top drivers (including Jean Eric Vergne and Sebastian Buemi) and legendary motorsport brands (such as Porsche, Mercedes and Audi) are available for the very first time in a Motorsport Manager game!

name: Monmusu Fight!

name: Mort's Dream Jump
summary: Join Mort in a dreamlike adventure through challenging levels, using a variety of movement-based powerups to help him overcome each obstacle!

name: Motor City
summary: Experience what it is like to be the owner of a car company.

name: MoveFort

name: Morigami

name: Monster Merge
summary: Grow Your Monster Collection!

name: Mottomo Abunai Deka
summary:
Mottomo Abunai Deka is an Action game, developed by Micronics and published by Toei Animation, which was released in Japan in 1990.

It is based on a Japanese movie released in 1989 with the same name. This game and the movie are both related to the late 1980s detective TV show, Abunai Deka.

name: Mojito the Cat: Deluxe Edition
summary: Remember! Gravity is not an issue if you have the right mindset. Multiple characters Become a fierce shark, an angry bull, a mighty rhino or a fluffy panda. With the Sushi DLC, you can also turn into a tasty Japanese-style rice snack. Key features: - min…

name: Mokoko
summary: A nostalgic arcade gameplay remastered! Capture areas and save the girls from various troublemakers. Comes along with 24 unique bosses and their absurd stories! Inspired from games like Volfied, Qix, Gals Panic.

name: Monopoly Tycoon

name: Monkey Mischief

summary: "I certainly hope you believe in something... ...every Story has to have an end...” The Good Left The City: the short novel conclusion to Alix: A MONITOR Story.

name: Monsters Love Candy
summary: A puzzle game from Other Ocean Interactive

name: Moon Slasher
summary: Slash the enemies, jump up to 'The MOON' and meet 'The MOON' at the top.

name: Monster Trucks Mayhem
summary: Monster Trucks Mayhem Make all your fantasies come true when you climb up into the cab of some of the baddest vehicles on the planet! Put your skills to the test against others in a free-wheelin carnage of destruction and mayhem! This all-new game debuts in time for the Holiday season on your Game Boy Advance!

name: Molt
summary: Molt is a turn-based deckbuilding card game in the vein of Hearthstone, Dominion and Wingspan. It aims to be educational and fun, with realistic depictions of snake species.

name: Moai VI: Unexpected Guests
summary: From vibrant jungles bursting with color, to an underwater wonderland teeming with aquatic life, to a cluster of floating islands, you'll traverse many magical lands filled with miracles. You'll also go toe-to-toe with awesome giants, outwit clever jellyfish and pet cute Manu-Ai to receive mana. Characters that range from the charming Posei-Don to the wicked Moko-Moko lizards will make each encounter a memorable one.

name: Morbolbo: Enter the Maze
summary: "Morbolbo: Enter the Maze" is a procedurally generated maze crawler, where you have to fight your way past traps and enemies and make it out of the mazes with mountains of gold.

name: Motor Stunt Xtreme
summary:
Motor Stunt Xtreme is a motocross racing game in which the goal is to reach the finish as fast as possible. You'll have to perform dangerous stunts and big jumps to get across canyons, valleys and all kinds of obstacles.

Tilt your device left and right to pull off front- and backflips but make sure you always land (safely) on your wheels! Move your device back and forth to keep your balance on the narrow surfaces you'll need to get across.

Compare your times with your friends or the rest of the world using the Game Center online leaderboards. The in-game online score overview shows you directly who of your friends is the fastest on each track.
You’ll earn a ‘Flawless race’ award for each level you complete without falling flat on your face.

Try to collect all 75 stars that are hidden throughout all levels. Some need alternative routes to get to them so keep your eyes open. When you pick up a star make sure to bring it to the next checkpoint without crashing. If you crash before the next checkpoint you will lose the star and have to pick it up again, so be careful!

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 5 - Legends Pack Vol. 1
summary: Relive the excitement of the past with the riders and track contained in the Legends Pack Vol. 1!

name: Mothership
summary: This is a single map set on a UFO. Works only in Eternity 4.00.00 or higher.

name: Mount Hop
summary: the original hopworld epilog

name: Monstermonger
summary: A strategic fantasy digital board game. Build a team to capture monsters. Choose whether to sell them for gold, or tame them and use their skills to help capture even bigger monsters. Gold now, or more gold later - only you can decide!

name: Monopoly City
summary: Monopoly City is a new imagination of the classic Monopoly board game. Play alone against the computer or against your friends in this new property builder title. Build houses, industrial complexes, skyscrapers and dominate your competition to become the ultimate winner.

name: Mouse Trap
summary: Mouse Trap is back with a snap! It’s the chaotic board game you remember, on your mobile! Join your friends and race to collect the most cheese.

name: Monsterwolf

name: Monkey Business
summary: Monkey business is a fun and exciting platform game that will keep you at the edge of your seat for days to come, with 4 Worlds, 36 levels to complete winning won't come easy. Jump, climb and fight with strange creatures, complete levels and open up new levels and World's. Travel through this adventure and reach the final level to fight against the Big Boss, we dare you!

name: Monochrome Ace
summary: A 1-bit style sidescrolling shoot-em-up

name: Morok
summary: Morok is interactive visual novel with a northern mood

name: Monster Maze VR
summary:
Monster Maze VR is a Halloween theme game with monsters that you can shoot. You will be teleported in spooky scenes, where you need to find your way out of the mazes.
A HTC Vive is required to play this game.

name: Monster of Nyum
summary: It is a light RPG that develops a character in a defense method every turn. Grow and overcome the ordeal to obtain the final goal, the Nyum- soul of the Boss-GuiYi.

name: Mommy's Warm Hot Spring: Poka-poka Mama Koi Onsen
summary:
"I'm the one who discovered the hot spring. Let's enjoy this together."
Refresh your daily fatigue with a soothing hot spring!

name: Moon Bus

name: More Invaders!
summary: More Invaders! is the sequel to Vector Vaders. It's how John wanted VV to look originally, but due to his lack of Vectrex programming experience at the time, couldn't make it so. More Invaders! has practically no screen flicker and plays very fast (compared to its predecessor), and has some enhanced features, such as splitting Invaders, trick saucers and special bonuses!

name: Monsters' Den Chronicles

name: Monster Girl Fantasy 2: Exposed

name: Moneygrabber
summary:
You gotta MAKE money to SPEND money! Moneygrabber is an easy to pick up, endless arcade game in which you grab money. All money that is grabbed can be spent on status symbols. Some status symbols enhances your grabbing capabilities, while others are just for show. The game is based around a likeable avatar that you can dress up, and who reacts humorously to your grabbing.

Make money, spend money, make money. Moneygrabber is a tongue in cheek simulation of life.

name: Monte Carlo
summary: Viewed from above, the player drives a race car through the twisting curves and straightaways of a moving track. The player can select between eight different tracks. Higher numbered tracks have more turns and narrow sections.

name: Move The Chains: Season 1
summary: Move The Chains is a choice-driven adult visual novel that puts you into the shoes of a hot-button athlete who finds himself being given a second chance after spending a year behind bars. The road to redemption is a long one, but it's packed with girls, love, drama, and of course, sex.

name: Modulate
summary: Modulate is a first-person puzzle game about discovery in unknown spaces.

name: Mountain Racing
summary: Mountain Racing is adventurous infinite racing game for everyone.You Will love to play this game again and again.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Monopoly Junior
summary: A computer adaptation of the 'lite' version of Parker Brothers classic real estate trading game. Monopoly Junior is a much simplified variation of Monopoly designed for 5-8 year olds. The PC version is a direct, kid friendly translation of the board game.

name: Molehill Empire
summary:
Molehill Empire is a fun economy simulation, revolving entirely around the microcosm garden. As free browser game it runs entirely in your web browser, without any additional downloads or software!
Given the task of an industrious garden gnome, you'll be able to create your very own private Garden of Eden. Lettuce, carrots, strawberries, spinach or onions - it's up to you which plants you want to grow. Visit the friendly towns of Green Valley and Hedgerow Ville to trade with other players, purchase new plants and decorations to spice up your own garden, deliver your customer's orders and always make sure to be a good neighbour ... or you might wake up one day to find your garden infested by an army of moles...

name: Motocross Mini Outrun
summary:
Out run the cops, collect cash and unlock new Cool Mini Motocross Bikes.
All bikes have different power and handling control.

name: More Enemies
summary: Put on your ass-kicking socks and get ready to have them promptly blown off in this indie monster-killing-bad-guy-fleeing-vent-crawling-chair-wielding shooter!

name: Movie World
summary: In Movie World you can build your own movie studio. Produce entertaining and glamorous movies. Research new technologies to keep up with the industry. Expand into series, compete with other studios, receive the awards, create franchises and prevail in the movie business.

name: Morningstar
summary: In this point-and-click adventure game your space ship crash-lands on a desolate planet. Your captain is wounded, your engineer: dead. You need to repair your vessel and solve the mystery of the planet to make it out of there alive.

name: Monochrome Racing
summary: Experience the sound of screeching tyres, the smell of burned rubber, the rush of adrenaline and enemies that are left in your dust – these are the emotions that drive real racers.

name: Mortal Shell: Enhanced Edition - Game of the Year Edition
Mosaico
summary: 2D puzzle game, developed by Devworks Game Technology and published by Tec Toy. The game was not sold on physical media, but released only in the memory of some models of the Mega Drive console sold in Brazil, such as the Super Mega Drive 3 - 71 Super Games.

name: Monkeet
summary:
Your sole means of movement is yeeting yourself through the air!
Forget about mundane monke stuff like boring walking or the slightly less boring swinging gracefully from tree to tree. No no no, we're talking monke mobility to a whole new level here!

name: Motorcycle Sales Simulator
summary: Bike Sales Simulator is a simulation game full of realistic trading mechanics, inviting players into the exciting world of a motorcycle trader. Research prices, negotiate, find the best deals and grow your own shop!

name: Mouse Trap
summary: Mouse Trap is back with a snap! It’s the chaotic board game you remember! Join your friends and race to collect the most cheese.

name: More Than Just Chess
summary: More Than Just Chess offers you the famous and proven board game classic improved upon by modern elements and mechanics, which reveals a unique playing experience.

name: Moraff's Escapade
summary:
Moraff's Escapade is a single player, shareware, arcade / puzzle game based on Lode Runner.

The game consists of a series of vertical ladders and horizontal platforms. Scattered around the game area are gemstones and the object of the game is to collect all the gems on a level in order to progress to the next. However the players progress is made more complex by the presence of Flesh Eaters who track the player and attempt to eat him/her.

name: MoonRun
summary: Traverse your battle hardend truck on an intense mission off-world, to conquer the invading forces behest on stealing your valuable resources.

name: Mouse adventure
summary: 3D adventure, platformer. A mouse wants to help a mechanic to repair cheese machine.

name: Mori
summary: The arcade shoot 'em up where getting angry is just a game mechanic.

name: Monarchies.io
summary: Take on the role of a queen honey bee, build a colony, and dominate the field.

name: Motorcycle Biker Simulator
summary: Motorbiker Physics Simulator is Physics Based Motorcycle Simulation Game.

name: Motorsport Manager Mobile 2
summary: The follow up to the 2014 open wheel racing management sim. Manage the autosports program of a fledgling constructor by hiring drivers, developing technology, and directing race strategy.

name: Monopoly IO
summary: Monopoly IO is the classic board game built for the web, complete with fully online multiplayer. Compete and negotiate for properties online with matchmaking, or grab some friends and play in a private session.

name: Moi Mei
summary: The fate of his brother in danger, May is going to be a dangerous journey.

name: Mountain Bike Racer
summary: This budget game is essentially Kikstart without the engines. It's viewed from the side, with 12 courses to complete within their respective time limits. You control the bike by setting the speed and jumping at the right moments. Hazards to negotiate include hills, walls, rocks, spikes and ice. Some of these can be circumnavigated by buying the right add-ons from the shop after each race. The amount of money you have to spend is dependent upon how quickly you completed the previous race.

name: Monkey Boxing
summary:
Become a boxing champion among apes
Monkey Boxing is an arcade game from Crescent Moon Games where you will control a monkey and fight your way through the boxing league. This title presents a unique take on your typical boxing games thanks to its hilarious game mechanics and unique in-app accessories and clothing.

name: Moto Racer World Tour
summary: Moto Racer World Tour is the third part of the Moto Racer series for the PlayStation. The game offers you to race on 34 different bikes in both dirt and street bike category. Each bike's settings can be manually adjusted. The game features 18 real-life tracks. Besides normal races you can play a variety of different modes, such as obstacle course, drag race, freestyle race (where you have to perform tricks to score points) and Traffic Race (with normal traffic on the road). The game features two player multiplayer.

name: Moujya
summary: Puzzle game featuing a feline cast released on arcade later ported to home consoles.

name: Moonlight Minions
summary: Moonlight Minions is an addictive tower-defense experience with a refreshing style. Defend your lands from the invading minion hordes using the arsenal of organic defenses and powerful abilities at your disposal.

name: Monster Stunts
summary: Monster Stunts - A stunt monster truck racing game. Drive the monster truck through the tracks as fast as you can to get rewards. Rotate 360 degrees to get more coins. Please be careful, don’t hit the ground, then would crash the monster trucks. Get more rewards to earn more coins. Unlock more monster trucks in shop.

name: Mood Swings

name: Momo and the Mine
summary: Help this charismatic mole collect matchsticks in an abandoned mine in this challenging platform game!

name: Motorsport Manager: Create Your Own Team
summary: Customise your team name, colours and livery – take control of your own team!

name: Move the Blocks
summary: A puzzle game from Geckonization.

name: Moon Colony

name: Mojin Returns
summary: Mojin Returns is a multiplayer online adventure survival game. You need to collect, make and build it to find clues for going to the tomb. Here are your teammates who are the same as you, but you also need to be wary of predators.A mysterious and thrilling adventure feast is about to begin

name: Mobile Suit Gundam
summary: Mobile Suit Gundam is a side-scrolling action game based on the popular anime series Mobile Suit Gundam.

name: Monster+Connect!
summary: Dating sim with cute monsters and 80's adventure game aesthetic.

name: Modern Fear
summary: A horror game and walking simulator

name: Movie Cinema Simulator
summary: Build the most successful cinema business in the world!

name: Monitoring All Night
summary: "Monitoring All Night" is a horror-style game in which you report anomalies while performing monitoring duties. Report anomalies appropriately and survive until the end of your shift. And watch out for the aliens.

name: Mountain Climber: Frozen Dream
summary:
Run, jump and climb as you avoid lethal obstacles to reach the summit!

Face numerous challenges in this exciting platformer as you help Sammy fulfill his dream of getting to the top and becoming a climber!

Mountain Climber: Frozen Dream is a platform game with superb 8-bit aesthetics and a touching story of self-improvement. A challenging game where every death is a lesson learned. Nobody ever said that climbing a mountain would be easy!

name: More Adventures of Big Mac: The Mad Maintenance Man
summary: Mastertronic and Mr. Chip Software teamed up to release this C64 platformer.

name: Moonshine Inc. + Bio Inc. Redemption: Drinking Problem Bundle
summary: Run moonshine business or become doctor (or death) - Moonshine Inc. + Bio Inc. Redemption

name: Molemen Must Die!

Deliver a bomb to the center of the Earth in this action arcade epic, inspired by your favorite B-grade action flicks. Get ready to fail in the name of Presidential pride!

name: Moto Racer 3
summary: Moto Racer 3 expands on the offerings found in Moto Racer 2, having more types of races including multiplayer online play.

name: Mountain Madness
summary:
Now 100% free to play, no ads, no nothing. We hope it puts a smile on your face in these tough times – stay safe!
Stay ahead of the angry avalanche that’s in hot pursuit, avoid hitting trees, frozen lakes and other obstacles – unless you love the spectacular wipe-outs! Trip unwary penguins on the piste, skid across roads and over cliffs and hit those perfect lines to collect all the crates!

name: Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp - Monster Camp Outfit Pack
summary: MOSTER PORM IS B4CK, BABY! You missed your all-time favs from renowned dating sim Moster Porm? Worry no more! They're all back, ready to enjoy Summer camp!

name: Mojica
summary: "Only the keyboard is used in this game!" Beat looming enemies with your typing skill! Switch lanes and defeat enemies by typing letters. This is an all-new typing game with strategy and a thrill.

name: Moon Alien Part II
summary: A very obscure Galaxian clone with energy bar timer.

name: Monster Shooter
summary: Monster Shooter sets its sights on Nintendo 3DS

name: Monsters Idle RPG
summary: Explore the world of Arcadius - a place filled with many types of mythical creatures - manage your creatures, items, capital, other resources and capture all creatures by battling in diverse biomes and places.

name: Moki Moki!
summary: Puzzle game for wiiware

name: Moonlit District
summary: Moonlit District is a Vanilla-Compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring textures from Perdition's gate. The WAD was a speed-map project made over the course of 4 days. It was tested in Chocolate Doom, Crispy Doom, and DSDA-Doom (complevel 2). Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.

name: Mother 4

With dark rumors of "Modern Men" running wild, these unassuming heroes set out to uncover the truth, no matter how dangerous. The game was based on the role-playing game series Mother. It was intended to emulate an official new installment to the series, but was rebranded into the original Oddity.

name: Motorcycle RPG
summary: Mark is starting a motorcycle business, and his first team members are his girlfriend Sabrina and another friend. But new trials begin to appear for them. Will everything work out the way they want it to?

name: Monster Girls Gaynerations: Ghoulfriends For Life
summary: Turned into a ghost, your only way to break the curse is true love's monstrous kiss

name: Moe Jigsaw: Blessing of the Campanella vol.2 Pack
summary: For those who want to enjoy more "Moe & Kawaii" illustrations with "Moe Jigsaw", we have prepared a special jigsaw puzzle pack.

name: Monstructs: Makers and Mayhem
summary: Make your own monsters and save the world!!

name: Monster Truck Drive
summary: Maneuver a capable modern monster truck in 4 unique levels: arena, moon, hills and dusk. No time limits. 3 different camera views. Perfect for casual gamers.

name: Morphling
summary: Shapeshifting Platformer Made for Ludum Dare

name: Monster Legacy: New Horizons 2
summary: Discover the second part of these peculiar adventurous children who explore fantastic worlds and encounter monsters of all kinds.

name: Monster Truck Arena: Battle Royale
summary: Crush the competition in epic arena battles!

name: Mom-chan Diet Wii Figureobics by Jung Da-yeon
Monster Strike
summary:
Monster Strike is a 3DS iteration of the popular smartphone game from mixi. The game is an RPG with the main gameplay being identical with the smartphone version and the world in 3D.
It features characters and stories introduced in the anime.

name: Mozi
summary: In the distant Milky Way galaxy, there hides a mysterious planet named Mozi Planet. This planet has a vast and boundless ocean, and every drop of seawater is shining with a mysterious light, as if telling the ancient interstellar secrets.

name: Monster Shooter
summary: Monster Shooter - an arcade shooter game. Player controls the scope and shoots at monsters jumping out of hiding. All your actions are counted in the bonus score. To go to the next level and test your skills in a new location, you need to gain a certain score.

name: Movie Grid
summary: Select a movie for each cell using the clues that correspond to that cell's rows and columns. Each game, you have nine movie guesses to fill out the grid. A movie cannot be used twice.

name: Monster Arena
summary: Indie Action PRG about life and battles of gladiators in the medieval setting with monsters and magic! Equip your gladiator, go to the arena and win! 10 unique types of weapon, plenty of monsters, 3 battle modes and many more.

name: Monkee Game

An endless bike driving game. It`s different every time, and easy to play.
Tilt your device to lean the bike. Touch right screen to accelerate. Touch left screen to brake. Touch both left and right screen to jump.

Meet Nyla. A 13 year old girl who is moving house.
However the old house looks to have other ideas.
Now work you way though your house to try an escape.

Pair of Pets

As the construction site manager, you have a huge responsibility to get one the world's largest monuments built on time by facing many unusual challenges. When was the last time you took on a superstar gladiator? Now's your chance!

name: Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold

Featuring introverted thinker Mortimer and spontaneous extrovert Kate, embark on an unexpected journey full of riddles and mysteries. What secrets lie written within the Book of Gold? Discover the beauty of emotion and the value of companionship in Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold.

name: Monster Museum
summary: Have you ever dreamed of having your own museum where you can collect monsters? Dream no further, because now you can do it in Monster Museum!

name: Moe Jigsaw: Happiness! Pack
summary: For those who want to enjoy more "Moe & Kawaii" illustrations with "Moe Jigsaw", we have prepared a special jigsaw puzzle pack.

name: Mortal Kombat: Defenders of the Earth
summary:
MK Defenders of the Earth is a non-profit fan-game created by Daniloabella based on the classic games of the MK saga.

Powered on Mugen, this game uses Borg117's Season 2 Final (Patch 4) as the base and material of the MKP 4.1 by MKP Team.

name: Monkey King Online
summary: Monkey King Online is a web-based ARPG. It features the heroes from the epic "Journey to the West."

name: Monster Slayer
summary: Monster Slayer is a sci-fi style hunting FPS game where you fight extraterrestrial monsters that proliferate on an island on Earth. The gun that the Player is equipped with has three different types of bullets, and you must use the unique effects of each to fight your way through!

name: MotorHeat
summary: You've got the ultimate racing car, and an unlimited road to drive on. What else do we need to say? It's all about driving. Lightning fast. No brakes, no limits.

name: Monster Legends
summary:
Battle with the ultimate legends and lead them into action in this online strategy RPG game! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary and Epic monsters, then start fighting in the arena.

Collect Monster Legends to uncover their fighting skills and boost your strategy in action packed RPG battles. Build a world in the game for monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and arena battles full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Master of Monster Legends!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start today!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

DISCOVER NEW LEGENDS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries. Be a hero!
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

RPG PROGRESSION & STRATEGY
- Level up your monsters and give them boosts for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and control monsters that work best together.
- Battles will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Fight PvP battles in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars is the ultimate Multiplayer experience: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a fantasy monster empire!

name: Monkey Flight
summary:
Launching JABBERING MONKEYS from a palm tree has never been this fun... and harmless!

Use your catapulting skills to become the KING OF THE JUNGLE, but watch out for dirty mud pools and ouchy rocks, or you might end up as the troop's back scratcher or tree shaker.

This is JUNGLE CATAPULTING at its best!

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: La Máquina Meteoroloca
Monster Bullets
summary: Monster Bullets is a retro fast paced FPS with a twist. Each monster has a unique weakness. Quickly load the correct bullet for each monster and fire them off! Experiment with upgrades on each procedurally generated attempt and try to reach the end!

name: Monster Waifu

name: Mojito the Cat: Extended Edition
summary: Roll into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world alongside an adorable cat named Mojito or some of his new friends.

name: Moot District
summary: Build and defend! Make Moot District yours!

name: MotoGP
summary:
MotoGP is a motorcycle racing game, based on PC and console series by THQ and international championship of the same name. There are several licensed real world teams with fifteen different riders and several motorcycles to choose from. Some are not available from the beginning and have to be unlocked by completing courses. There are totally seven of them, advertised as based on real circuits around the world.

Included game modes are Grand Prix, time trials, single races and, exclusively for N-Gage wireless multiplayer for up to four players using Bluetooth connection. Unlike earlier MotoGP for GBA, this one runs in full 3D, including both environment and bikes. The lap records could've been uploaded to the N-Gage Arena service and shared online.

Another unique feature to this particular version is a simple track editor, where you can construct new racing stages from scratch, using top-down view and various turns. Those custom tracks could be later accessed in the single race mode.

name: Monster MIX
summary:
Welcome to the world of funny monsters!
Evolution simulator in 2D with cute graphics.

name: Monster Trucks Nitro II
summary: An iOS game where you race obstacle courses using various monster trucks.

name: Moonlit Lobby
summary: Moonlit Lobby is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as a cat named Harley who's fleeing from the rain and maybe more. Tell stories to earn your stay for the night!

name: Money Maker
summary: Embark on a journey to build the greatest empire ever known by simply clicking your mouse. Your goal is to amass as much wealth as possible, and you'll do so by starting small and gradually expanding your empire one click at a time.

name: Motorsport Manager for Nintendo Switch
summary: In Motorsport Manager for Nintendo Switch, the console debut for the series, you will build, customize, and lead your very own high-performance Motorsport team through 9 tiers of racing action, across three car classes to become number one. Race to win in this immersive management strategy title where real-time racing decision making and forward planning are the key to victory.

name: Monster partner
summary: This is a capture monster, cultivate monsters, monsters against the game.The game has no end. Each strange partner has its own characteristics, composed of different teams to play a different strength. And NPC team can fight together. Can capture all the blame to fill the illustrations.

summary: Announced for the Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack, Ermac is a returning character previously playable in Mortal Kombat X as part of the main roster.

name: Moon Lander
summary: Clone of the arcade game Lunar Lander, where the player must land their ship on a series of several moons while dealing with gravity, wind, diminishing fuel and enemy satellites.

name: Moomin's Tale

summary: An early online multiplayer game for PC and Commodore 64.

name: Morituri Te Salutant

Doomguy has found himself summoned to an ancient, crumbling villa - the court of the Red Emperor. The Emperor is conspicuously absent, but he and his cronies watch with great interest from afar as you rip and tear your way through his tests. Will you make it through the trials, or will you be split from nose to navel? Play and find out.

name: Mojito the Cat: Christmas Skins
summary: Expand your cube-shaped friend collection with this 4 new Christmas based skins

name: Mortal Kombat: Arcade Edition
summary:
Main features of this project:

- A Lot of hacking to add new GFX details, Polishments, Timing improvements, Sound samples, New features… Master Linkuei did all this stuff with the help from Billytime!Games.
- Master Linkuei remade all the bio and ending screen using the arcade gfx as base. Including the 2 absent ending screens from Kano.
- Every graphic made by PROBE Software was completely changed or improved by Master Linkuei, Chev Chelios and Danilo Dias to look more accurate.
- New animations for the Courtyard (monks and tsung), Palace Gates (Flame), Warrior’s Shrine (Flame during Ermac fight) and Throne Room (Shang Tsung head + Shang Tsung clap).
- Added +80 sound samples from the Arcade!
- BillyTime!Games added a whole new SRAM system to save the Winning Streak name list.
- Improved gameplay removing delays and improving the whole timing.
- Option to change between original Music order or a more accurate one.

And MUCH more…

name: Moments
summary: Sol and Chet!

summary: Movies Tycoon is a tycoon simulation game where you dive into the world of film-making. Start with a humble studio, scout and manage top talent, customize unique characters, and direct blockbuster films.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate - Kollector's Edition
summary: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate - Kollector's Edition comes with a 1:1 scale Sub-Zero Mask, a steelcase, exclusive Avalanche Sub-Zero DLC, and the Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate game package as well.

name: Moxina
summary: Moxina comes from the pronunciation of Mô-sîn-á in chinese. It is a Taiwan Folklore as it is a child-like ghost that frequently appeared in the forest. It would hypnosis the targeted person and bring him to the forest. [/img]

name: Mortal Kombat Kollection Online
summary:
A remastered collection of the first 3 games that has been in the news in various forms for years, though a canceled project was confirmed in 2019.

Recently, January 2020, a PEGI rating appeared for the game listing the trilogy for PC and current generation consoles with the blurb:

"Mortal Kombat Kollection Online is the original Mortal Kombat trilogy that MK fans always wanted. Upgraded art, gameplay, and online features provide an incredible experience that revive the "klassics" ..."

The release date listed, January 21st, was obviously incorrect but most games leaked this way are eventually released.

name: Moy 6
summary: A virtual pet game with over 50 minigames, such as: action games, puzzle games, arcade games and even casual games. There is also lots of exciting rooms and activities to keep you entertained for hours.

name: Monster Lover 2: Ambrosilas
summary: He's a Failure of a Yakuza. He's an Arcane Murder Genie - Can They Find Love? Our main character has been a screw-up his entire life. That's what led him to the Yakuza. He needs help, and summons Ambrosilas. But this sexy murder genie doesn't like helping criminals!

name: Mordheim: City of the Damned - Complete Edition
summary:
Organize ingenious battle plans in the ultimate experience of the first video game adaptation of Games Workshop's cult classic tabletop game Mordheim.

The Complete Edition includes:
• The full game
• Witch Hunters Warband DLC
• Undead Warband DLC
• Poison Wind Globadier Hired Sword DLC
• Smuggler Hired Sword DLC
• Wolf-Priest of Ulric Hired Sword DLC
• Doomweaver Hired Sword DLC

name: Monster Box
summary:
Monster overflowing and Battle of Stickman!

Stickman after upgrade in gold and jewel, please earnestly defeat a lot of monsters. By upgrade the monster, enjoy fight against powerful monsters.

name: Moonfang
summary: Moonfang is a solo puzzle game offering 20 levels of gameplay, separated in 5 theatrical acts. Controlling 3 characters, each witch a specific set of skills and attributes, find a way to the exit of each level. Each level offers a new challenge, and an optional hidden cat to save.

name: Mountain Driving
summary: Mountain Driving is an open world mountain driving game, but the map in the game is not very large. Because this game was developed by one person.

name: Mortal Online
summary:
Experience true open-world freedom in Mortal Online - a unique first-person, medieval fantasy, massively multiplayer online role-playing game.Choose your path!

Choose from many different races, decide your own style of play and whether to focus on PvP or PvE, both sharing the same game world.
Choose a profession and devote your life to combat, crafting, magic, trading...
Discover countless skills, resources and tools, master a few or dabble in them all, or be the first to explore new areas to find hidden treasures and unique secrets.
Live or die!

name: Model Academy
summary: You play to advance from being the girl next door to a popular top model.

name: M.o.o.n.
summary: M.O.O.N. is another old Scott Cawthon game. It's a RPG game that takes place in space.

name: Moe Jigsaw: Hyper-Highspeed-Genius Pack
summary: For those who want to enjoy more "Moe & Kawaii" illustrations with "Moe Jigsaw", we have prepared a special jigsaw puzzle pack.

name: MonsterLife

name: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED: Battle Destiny
ModernArcheryVR
summary: Reset and refresh your mind with VR and Competitive Archery!

name: Monster Mystery
summary: A game of survival and Mystery. 3 - 10 Explorers find themselves deep in the mountains of Transilvania. They must stay in the light or die in the dark for within one of them lies a monster.

name: Mortal Kombat Mythologies: Sub-Zero
summary:
Mortal Kombat Mythologies: Sub-Zero is a story-driven fighting game that casts you in the shoes of Sub-Zero, and chronicles a series of events that occurred prior to Mortal Kombat 1. It is the first Mortal Kombat game to feature side-scrolling gameplay.

Gameplay wise the game takes the Mortal Kombat familiar 2D fighting environment and turns it into a hybrid fighter/platformer game, where you must travel trough hazardous levels running and jumping around as well as fighting your way against both digitized and polygonal enemies. Sub-Zero's interface is the same as in every MK game, with the addition of a "use" and "turn around" buttons and additions such as an inventory, and a slight RPG twist in which you get exp. for defeating opponents, which translates into new techniques and moves to execute in the game.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Vol. 2 - Jaburo
summary: The second in a trilogy of Wonderswan games that are based on the original Mobile Suit Gundam anime.

name: Monovert DX
summary: Monovert is a 2d puzzle platformer. You play as a square who has an ability to invert the level.

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Digatron
summary: If you're not afraid to do the dirty job, DIGatron is the perfect truck to dig some mud on the Monster Jam Showdown dirt!

name: Motocross Racer
summary: Bone-jarring off-road motorcycle racing in three events. You first must qualify in the Desert Scramble where you race across the desert avoiding the prickly cactus, desert creatures, rocks, etc., in a race of speed and time. Hit an object and your dirt bike slows down. Hit too many and you won't qualify for the next race. The Hill Climb is a torturous race up a switchback mountain full of obstacles. Speed is important but control is vital or you'll be out of the race. Qualify with a fast time and you're in the Beach Sprint against other qualifiers in an all-out dash for the championship.

name: MoHo
summary:
MoHo is a Sega Dreamcast game developed by Lost Toys and published by Take 2 Interactive in 2000. It is notable for being the only exclusive Dreamcast game for the United Kingdom, despite receiving ratings from the German USK and French SELL ratings bodies and having its back cover description translated into German.

An American release under the name of Ball Breakers was planned for release in November 2000[5], but cancelled near completion; three different rips of a late prototype were leaked simultaneously in 2012.

name: Monster Girl Club Bifrost
summary: Pay back your debt to the Grim Reaper in this management simulation game! You're a monster trainer in an up-and-coming nightclub where the lovely ladies of the night are enslaved monster girls trained by you. Win your freedom back no matter what it takes!

name: More Grillin'
summary:
More Grillin’ is the perfect summertime fun app for your iPhone, iPod Touch, or iPad. Fire up the virtual grill, throw on some burgers, hot dogs, veggie burgers or even steaks. Hear the sizzle and watch the flames dance, while you flip your food to cook it, then dress it up with dozens of sauces, toppings, and side dishes. All with sharpest graphics we’ve ever had (full resolution on iPhone/iPod Touch, iPad, and even iPhone 4 Retina Display!), and of course the attention to detail Maverick is known for.

After you’ve made your burger, bratwurst, or chicken, and given it the perfect presentation with custom plates & tablecloths, share a picture with your friends via email, Facebook, or save it to your photo album. And of course you can eat it! Take virtual bites and have your own picnic.

name: Monster Home
summary: This is a top down RPG. A girl named Aliosha. She inherited the bloodline of the strongest summoner and the monster farm left by her father. This game can collect various monsters, manage farms, and explore unknown worlds.

name: Monsters vs. Aliens: The Mobile Game
summary: Monsters vs. Aliens: The Mobile Game is a mobile game based on the movie Monsters vs. Aliens.

name: Moai 6: Unexpected Guests - Collector's Edition
summary: Join two heroes on one grand adventure! Guide Hika-Ri and Kao-Ri on the adventure of their lives and enjoy countless hours of fun on the enchanted island of Tapa-Tui!

name: Mouse House
summary:
Wiiware game by Big John Games.

He’s clever, he’s daring, he’s brave, he’s…a mouse! Mouse House is an accessible and fast-paced logic puzzle game in which you lead a lively little mouse on his hunt to collect the cheese in each of 100 challenging puzzles. But these are no simple mazes – our adorable hero has to weave his way through a cast of colorful critters including stinger-shooting bees and nasty rats, as well as tricky traps like conveyor belts, collapsing floors and more! A true “pick up and play” game, Mouse House’s combination of simple controls and multiple levels of challenge make it perfect for players of all ages!

name: Moira: Fated Twins
summary: 《Moira: Fated Twins》是Arcanea Loft制作的大型RPG游戏。玩家将扮演一对流离他乡的兄妹，在残酷的世界中求生和成长，并在这不公平的世界中对命运做出选择。年幼的双子与家人一起生活在的和平的Arcadia山中，然而这份平静却很快被打破了。为了能找到彼此，Eleuseus和Artemisia踏上了各自的旅程。

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: La Banda de Corvino
summary: Mort & Phil, created by Ibáñez, return to the charge in the world of the video game of the hand of spanish Alcachofa Soft. Three games in one is offers "La Banda del Corvino".

name: MotoGP 21: Limited Edition Liveries
summary: Purchase Limited Edition Liveries and compete with five iconic riders and their exclusive bikes. Unique liveries created for special events during their careers.

name: Moves
summary: Moves is a minimalist puzzle game where you must use your mathematical skills to solve tricky puzzles.

name: Monster Roadtrip Hitchhiker Pack: The Color Squad
summary:
Amira Rashid is a fierce woman who's always ready to take on any challenge.
Oz is a nervous smol bean who's trying his best.
Vicky Schmidt is an energetic dork who's always ready to help other people.
Brian Yu is... just Brian -- and we love him because of it! Such a chill dude.

name: Moto Rider Go: Highway Traffic
summary: Moto Rider Go: Highway Traffic brings to you a compelling and satisfying traffic dodging experience in the world!

name: Morning
summary: This is a 2D game. Players operate the mouse, click to explore and obtain props, watch dialogue to advance the plot, and play the role of the protagonist alone in a house late at night, exploring daily and unfamiliar things, and unfolding the truth of her life.

name: Mokete
summary: Mokete is a turn-based roguelike game with cartoon graphics and an alien theme. You'll take control of a brave alien who uses abducted animals in thrilling battles on Earth to become the zone champion and face mythical beings.

name: Mountain Troll
summary: Mountain Troll is a simple 2D platformer in which you play as a mountain Troll. Imagine that you are the kindest Troll in the world and someone stole your stuff, you have to get them back!

name: MokMok
summary: MokMok is a musical adventure. A unique experience set in a bizarre world, inhabited by Mok´s - living musical instruments. Take part in a funky adventure and discover interactive tunes.

name: Moero!! Judo Warriors
summary:
Moero!! Judo Warriors is a Family Computer video game that was released in 1990.

The box art shows competitors in an international judo tournament; flags of different countries like the Soviet Union, France, Brazil, the United States of America, and Japan are used to signify the eliteness of the virtual competition. Players must travel around the world in search of judo opponents. The player even gets to compete in the Summer Olympic Games under his discipline of judo after defeating five opponents. However, this would most like refer to either the 1992 Summer Olympic games in Barcelona, Spain because of the game release date. Nine opponents must be defeated in the Olympic Games in order to collect the gold medal. Losing some matches while winning other may result in the awarding of either the silver or the bronze medal.

name: Monster Mashing Deluxe
summary: An infinite runner where the hornier you are the faster you go! A game that Newgrounds could not contain.

name: Momodora 0: Day of Birth
summary: Momodora 0: Day of Birth is a small, silly Momodora fangame made as a birthday present for the creator of the Momodora series.

name: Monopoly
summary: Monopoly is a PlayStation video game based on the board game Monopoly, released on November 6, 1997 in Europe. Developed by Gremlin Interactive and published by Hasbro Interactive, this title was one of many inspired by the property. Despite using the same box art as the 1995 PC version of Monopoly, it is not the same game.

name: Mortal Kombat: Kollector's Edition
summary: The The Kollector's Edition the Mortal Kombat game, Sub-Zero and Scorpion figurines, a collectible art book, downloadable content that includes an exclusive Mortal Kombat Klassic costume skin and avatar costumes.

summary: For those who want to enjoy more "Moe & Kawaii" illustrations with "Moe Jigsaw", we have prepared a special jigsaw puzzle pack.

summary: For those who want to enjoy more "Moe & Kawaii" illustrations with "Moe Jigsaw", we have prepared a special jigsaw puzzle pack.

name: Moonlight Sculptor: Darkgamer
summary:
Step into the era where the renowned adventurer, Weed, wove his enigmatic and unparalleled legacy. Embark on a journey to conquer the Verisa Continent Pass anew!
A fresh narrative that stays faithful to the essence of the original novel.

No longer is the planet Monsteca the harmonious world it once was—it's been overrun by a robotic army set out to rule and conquer. name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Spirits of Zeon
summary:
From the attack on Jaburo to the final stand at A Baoa Qu Spirits of Zeon follows two Principality soldiers, Kurt and Robin, also known as the two Ogres, in their fight to survive. Players shoot their way through eight sequential stages starting in Jaburo, through the escape into space, the defense of Solomon, and lastly to the last outpost of Zeon. At the end of their path lies a duel with the White Devil, and hero of the One Year War, Amuro Ray.

Stages are completed by shooting everything in your path until reaching a boss fight. In addition to the Zaku II's assault rifle the mobile suit is also equipped with a Heat Axe to attack nearby enemies, a high damage limited-ammunition bazooka that can blow apart shielded enemies, and a limited-ammunition mine that hits every enemy onscreen and can be thrown while ducking. Raising the gun vertically ducks, reloading the gun and avoiding marked enemy fire and melee range attacks. Additional health and ammunition are contained a item creates, and bonus points can be gained by shooting difficult to hit targets or completing secret objectives. Some stages also come with optional objectives, such as defending Solomon from a missile barrage or shooting down more targets than Char.

A wide range of rare Federation technology make boss-fight appearances in the game, including a squad of RX-79, the Full Armor 78-1, and the first game appearance of the RGM Striker.
